content.cn: 触碰涡流团后，主控干员会加速一小段时间。
content.en: Touching a vortex gives a temporary speed boost to the controlled operator.

content.cn:
锚点会源源不断地产生危险的<@gd.key>震荡波</>
如果被震荡波所波及，则会被强制传送离开。
content.en: Ankhors can constantly emit dangerous <@gd.key>shockwaves</>. If the controlled operator is hit by this shockwave, the entire team will be forced to retreat.

content.cn: 只有击破<@gd.key>锚点核心</>，才能阻止震荡波的产生。
content.en: Destroy the <@gd.key>Ankhor core</> to stop the shockwaves.

content.cn: <@gd.key>源石树枝</>能形成<@gd.key>保护罩</>，进入保护罩可免受震荡波的伤害。
content.en: <@gd.key>Originium branches</> can generate a <@gd.key>protective shield</>. Get behind the shield for protection against the shockwaves.

content.cn: 某些源石树枝的保护罩在经受一次震荡波的攻击后就会破碎并失去保护效果，经过一段时间后才会恢复。
content.en: The shield of some Originium branches will shatter and lose its protective effects after taking a shockwave hit. Such shields will take a while to recover.

content.cn:
探索可以回收资源的<@gd.key>协议空间</>时，会消耗<@gd.key>理智</>。
<@gd.key>理智</>消耗后，会随自然时间回复，达到上限后停止。
可使用<@gd.key>特定道具</>回复理智。
content.en: Exploring resource <@gd.key>Protocol Spaces</> will cost <@gd.key>Sanity</>. <@gd.key>Sanity</> naturally recovers with time until it reaches a max limit. <@gd.key>Special items</> can also be used to recover Sanity.

content.cn:
探索中可能遇到一些可以使用<@gd.key>爆炸物</>爆破的墙体或者石块等物体。
这些可爆破物的表面会有红色的纹路或者可爆破的标记。
content.en: Certain walls or rocks found during exploration can be destroyed with <@gd.key>explosives</>. These destructible objects exhibit red-colored cracks and are marked with icons to indicate their destructibility.

content.cn:
激活<@gd.key>协议传送点</>后，即可使用该节点的各项功能。
可使用<@gd.key>休整</>功能，将编队中的干员<@gd.key>生命值回满</>，并将失去联系的干员恢复联系。
content.en: Activate the <@gd.key>TP Point</> to use its functions. The <@gd.key>Rest</> function can resuscitate all disconnected operators and restore the entire team to <@gd.key>Max HP</>.

content.cn: 在<@gd.key>协议传送点</>附近的安全区范围内，可使用<@gd.key>仓储管理</>功能，将背包中暂时用不到的物品存放至仓库，以获得更大的背包容量。
content.en: Being in the safe zone near the <@gd.key>TP Point</> makes the <@gd.key>storage management</> function available. Use this function to stash unneeded Backpack items into the Depot and free up some Backpack space.

content.cn:
长耳兽是生活在塔卫二上的一种生物。
跟随背负花朵的长耳兽，可以找到一些它藏匿起来的资源。
content.en: Long-ears are one of the many beasts living in the world of Talos-II. Follow long-ears carrying flowers on their backs to find their hidden resource stash.

content.cn: 在跟随长耳兽的过程中，如果与它间隔太远，它会重新回到一开始的位置。
content.en: When tracking a long-ear, the critter will escape and return to the starting position if it manages to get far away enough from its pursuers.

content.cn:
平平无奇的区域，但似乎能帮助管理员回忆起一些“维修技巧”。
不妨四处看看，或许那些仍能运作的设备，又或者岩石与草木，都能为你提供维修灵感。
content.en: An ordinary-looking place, but it seems capable of helping the Endministrator remember certain "repair techniques". Look around, Endministrator. The machinery, rocks, grasses, and trees might provide the Repair Logic required.

content.cn: 进入旧式传送带范围，可随<@gd.key>旧式传送带一起移动</>，但<@gd.key>无法随货物箱一起进入检货口</>。
content.en: Step on an old conveyor belt to <@gd.key>move with it</>. However, people <@gd.key>cannot enter the incoming cargo crate inspection port</>.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>塔吊</>是能够吊运集装箱等重物的设备。
可以沿着<@gd.key>控制线路</>找到塔吊对应的<@gd.key>操作台</>，对塔吊进行控制。
content.en: <@gd.key>Tower cranes</> are big machines for lifting and moving cargo containers. Follow the <@gd.key>control cables</> to find a tower crane <@gd.key>control panel</>, then interact with the control panel to control the tower crane.

content.cn: 一个塔吊能够同时拥有多个操作台。不同的操作台支持的操作有所不同（包括<@gd.key>放下货物</>、<@gd.key>转动吊臂</>等）。
content.en: A tower crane may be linked to multiple control panels that control it differently. These controls include: <@gd.key>lowering the cargo container</> or <@gd.key>rotating the lifting arm</>.

content.cn: 某些塔吊的操作台可能会处于损坏状态，需要<@gd.key>修复</>后才能使用。
content.en: Some tower crane control panels may be damaged. They must be <@gd.key>repaired</> before they can be used.

content.cn: 可使用吊运装置终端，控制指定的货物按照面板上<@gd.key>指示的方式</>移动。
content.en: Use the crane lifter terminal and follow the <@gd.key>instructions provided</> on the control panel to move the target cargo.

content.cn:
有些源石虫背上有着源石树枝。
当<@gd.key>震荡波</>到来时，这些源石树枝会自动展开<@gd.key>保护罩</>，进入即可免受<@gd.key>震荡波</>的伤害。
content.en: Some Originium Slugs have Originium branches growing out of them. These Originium branches will automatically generate <@gd.key>shielded areas</> when the <@gd.key>shockwaves</> hit. Enter them to get protection against the <@gd.key>shockwaves</>.

content.cn: 被激光命中后会被<@gd.key>击退</>或<@gd.key>击飞</>，虽然不会受伤，但仍需注意躲避。
content.en: A person gets <@gd.key>knocked back</> or <@gd.key>knocked away</> when hit by defensive lasers. No DMG will be taken, but be careful.

content.cn:
因各种状况而陷入故障的Delta型多功能机器人。
还请管理员使用能力多多<@gd.key>修复</>它们吧！
content.en: Many Delta general-purpose robots have been damaged due to various causes. Use the Endministrator's special abilities to <@gd.key>repair</> them!

content.cn: 塔卫二分布着众多可被采集的资源，有些可以直接采集，有些则需要<@gd.key>攻击</>后才能够采集。
content.en: Talos-II has all sorts of gatherables. Some can be gathered immediately, while others must be <@gd.key>attacked</> and smashed into smaller pieces before they can be gathered.

content.cn: 武陵地区一些大门会受到<@gd.key>多个机关控制</>。大门上的<@gd.key>投影数量</>通常代表着<@gd.key>机关数量</>。要将机关<@gd.key>全部激活</>，大门才会打开。
content.en: Certain gates in the region of Wuling are controlled by <@gd.key>multiple mechanisms</>. The <@gd.key>number of projections</> on a gate indicates the <@gd.key>number of mechanisms</> controlling it. <@gd.key>All mechanisms must be activated</> to open the gate.

content.cn: 使用<@gd.key>射流无人机</>激活附近对应数量的<@gd.key>转轮机关</>，即可解锁大门。
content.en: Use a <@gd.key>jet drone</> to activate nearby <@gd.key>rotating mechanisms</> to unlock certain gates.

content.cn: 使用<@gd.key>排水闸</>后，可将一处水体内的液体排放至另一处水体内，直至原水体内排空，或排放至的水体已满。
content.en: Use the <@gd.key>sluice gate</> to discharge water from one water body to another until the source water body is empty, or the destination water body is full.

content.cn: <@gd.key>液体类型不同</>的两处水体间，不可通过排水闸相互排放液体。
content.en: A sluice gate cannot be used if the two water bodies connected by it contain <@gd.key>different fluids</>.

title.cn: 不可使用排水闸的情况

content.cn:
塔卫二分布着一些协议空间，小队进入后会前往一个独立的空间进行探索。
可以查看协议空间的基本信息、危险程度和敌方情报。
某些协议空间还有着可回收的资源 ，可根据当前资源情况自行选择所需探索的协议空间。
content.en: Protocol Spaces are scattered throughout Talos-II. These isolated spatial pockets can be explored by a competent team. Study the basic details, threat levels, and enemy intel of the Protocol Space before exploration. Some Protocol Spaces also offer salvageable resources. Explore them accordingly to gather the desired resources.

content.cn:
四号谷地中散布着一些损坏的电力装备，需要使用某些材料才能修复。
修复完成后，可以获得一定的奖励。
content.en: Many damaged power facilities are scattered across Valley IV. Certain materials are required to repair them. Successful repair work also offers certain rewards.

content.cn:
高压阻拦网激活时，无法通过。
沿着<@gd.key>电力运输线路</>找到其对应的开关，即可关闭高压阻拦网，通过原本被其封锁的路段。
content.en: Certain paths and areas are blocked by active high voltage fences. Follow the fences' <@gd.key>power cables</>, find the switch, and use it to shut down the fences for safe passage.

content.cn:
塔卫二中的某些地方会出现<@gd.key>能量淤积点</>。
靠近能量淤积点并<@gd.key>激发</>，可以查看能量淤积点的详细信息。
content.en: <@gd.key>Energy Alluvium</> may appear at certain locations of Talos-II. Approach an Energy Alluvium to <@gd.key>activate</> it and view its details.

content.cn:
开启挑战后，淤积点处将会出现大量敌人。
首次击败某个能量淤积点出现的全部敌人后会获得<@gd.key>首通奖励</>。
content.en: After activating a challenge, a large number of enemies will appear at the Alluvium. Defeating all enemies of an Energy Alluvium for the first time provides a <@gd.key>1st clear reward</>.

content.cn: 击败重度能量淤积点的敌人后，可以<@gd.key>消耗理智</>，获取更多<@gd.key>基质</>。每个淤积点获取的基质会拥有<@gd.key>一定范围内</>的基质属性。
content.en: After defeating enemies of a Severe Energy Alluvium, <@gd.key>spend Sanity</> to acquire more <@gd.key>essences</>. Every alluvium site provides essences with <@gd.key>a specific range of stats</>.

title.cn: 重度能量淤积点 - 一

content.cn: 可以通过在重度能量淤积点处<@gd.key>预刻写基质属性</>，来限定获取的武器基质拥有的属性。预刻写生效需要在领取奖励时消耗所在地区的<@gd.key>刻写券</>。
content.en: When challenging a Severe Energy Alluvium, use the <@gd.key>Pre-Engrave Stats</> option to narrow down the range of weapon essence stats. Pre-Engrave costs local <@gd.key>engraving permits</>, which must be spent when claiming the energy alluvium rewards.

title.cn: 重度能量淤积点 - 二

content.cn:
装备模板箱中存放着机器人们收集来的装备生产数据。
打开模板箱可以解锁新的装备制造模板。不同模板需要用不同地区的主要装备原件才能生产。
content.en: Gear template crates include gear assembly data that the robots have gathered. Open these crates to unlock new gear templates for assembling new types of gear. Different templates may also need components specific to the region.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>动态侵蚀</>遍布于塔卫二，会阻塞通路，对探索造成影响。
消除动态侵蚀，才可进行更深入的探索。
content.en: <@gd.key>Active Blight</> can be found in various places of Talos-II. They can block roads and impede exploration efforts. Active Blight masses must be eliminated for exploration to continue.

content.cn:
接触到动态侵蚀的干员会持续受到其负面影响，并在很短时间内达到<@gd.key>承受极限</>。
脱离动态侵蚀的范围，就可以消除这种负面影响。
content.en: Operators who touch Active Blight will suffer various negative effects, quickly reach their <@gd.key>tolerance limit</>, and disconnect. Removing the operators from Active Blight will undo the negative effects.

content.cn:
在侵蚀核心被暴露之前，动态侵蚀将无法被消除。
通过<@gd.key>攻击</>或使用<@gd.key>爆炸物</>破坏暴露的侵蚀核心，即可消除该侵蚀核心所引发的动态侵蚀。
content.en: Active Blight cannot be eliminated unless its Blight Core is exposed. An exposed Blight Core can be destroyed by <@gd.key>attacks</> or <@gd.key>explosives</> to eliminate the Active Blight created by it.

content.cn:
在野外探索时，有时会发现闪烁着奇异光芒的物体——<@gd.key>醚质</>。
队友有时会发现野外醚质的具体位置，并<@gd.key>给出提示</>。
content.en: <@gd.key>Aurylenes</> are mysterious entities that emit strange sparkling lights. They may be found during exploration. Teammates may <@gd.key>give a reminder</> when they notice the locations of Aurylenes in the wilderness.

content.cn:
活性醚质是一种特殊醚质，具备不同的活性化特征。
有的会自主移动；有的则“善于隐蔽”——需要通过<@gd.key>扫描</>才能确认他们的位置。
content.en: Active Aurylenes are forms of unstable Aurylene that exhibit a range of special properties. Some can move on their own, while others are good at "hiding" and can only be revealed by <@gd.key>scanning</>.

content.cn: 将<@gd.key>醚质</>提交到<@gd.key>协议传送点</>处，可获得探索有帮助的道具，<@gd.key>增加体力上限</>。
content.en: Submit <@gd.key>Aurylenes</> at any <@gd.key>TP Point</> to receive items that can support exploration and <@gd.key>increase Stamina limit</>.

content.cn: 当<@gd.key>受击装置</>受到<@gd.key>攻击</>或<@gd.key>爆炸冲击</>会暂时改变运行状态。
content.en: A <@gd.key>reactive device</> temporarily changes its operation mode when <@gd.key>attacked</> or <@gd.key>hit by an explosion</>.

content.cn: 拍一拍<@gd.key>周身萦绕光点</>的吐虫长股兽，它会吐出萤火虫，将其传递至<@gd.key>终点位置的长股兽</>吧！
content.en: Pat a <@gd.key>glowing bugspitting lankybeast</> and it will spit out a glowbug, then pass that glowbug to the <@gd.key>lankybeast at the finishing position</>.

content.cn: 有些长股兽不在传递位置上，可以适当地<@gd.key>驱赶</>它们，这些长股兽会在有人靠近后跳开，利用这种特性，可以让它前往<@gd.key>适合传递萤火虫的位置</>。
content.en: Some lankybeasts are not at bug passing positions, but will jump away when people get close. Use this property and <@gd.key>chase</> them around to force the lankybeasts to a <@gd.key>proper bug passing position</>.

content.cn: 也有些不在传递位置的长股兽会<@gd.key>跟随荷叶移动或升降</>，利用荷叶的移动规则，也可以让它们帮助传递萤火虫。
content.en: Some lankybeasts not in the passing positions <@gd.key>move around or up and down with their lotus leaves</>. Study how the lotus leaves move and use the lankies on the leaves to pass the bugs.

content.cn: <@gd.key>易燃凝胶</>是一种易燃、易爆物质，在被<#item.procBomb>工业爆炸物</>引爆后，会引发周边其他的<@gd.key>易燃凝胶</>爆炸。
content.en: <@gd.key>Flammable Gel</> is a flammable and explosive substance. It can be detonated by <#item.procBomb>Industrial Explosives</> and the resulting explosion can also detonate nearby patches of <@gd.key>Flammable Gel</> as well.

content.cn: 交互后，叉车会将所持货物抬高。
content.en: Interact with forklifts to raise or lower their lifting forks.

content.cn:
通过击打装置，可以让其转动起来。
需要持续击打此类装置，并将转速维持在一定区间内。转速过快或过慢都会损失进度。
content.en: Hit a Percussive Device to make it rotate. Continue hitting it to keep its rotation rate within a certain range. Operational progress will be lost if the rotation rate gets too high or low.

content.cn: 连接<@gd.key>控流节点</>后，在控流节点的范围内，可使用其中的清水为<@gd.key>射流无人机</>提供液体。
content.en: After connecting to a <@gd.key>flow control node</>, a <@gd.key>jet drone</> within range of the flow control node can be refilled with Clean Water from it.

content.cn:
可使用<@gd.key>弹射装置</>进行一次长距离的跳跃，抵达普通跳跃无法到达的高处。
弹射装置处于激活状态时，站立在其上并按下<@gd.key>跳跃键</>即可使用。
content.en: Use <@gd.key>Bounce Devices</> to make a long-distance jump or reach high places unreachable with normal jumping. Simply stand on a functioning Bounce Device and press the <@gd.key>jump button</> to use it.

content.cn:
某些弹射装置，需要激活对应的<#adv.eswitch>受击装置</>后能够使用；
还有一些弹射装置，需要传输电力至对应的<#adv.powerTerminal>供电终端</>后，才能够使用。
content.en: Some Bounce Devices must be first activated by striking the linked <#adv.eswitch>Reactive Device</> to become usable. Some Bounce Devices can only be activated after powering the <#adv.powerTerminal>Electric Nexus</> linked to it.

content.cn: 站上去会自动触发喷气，可以抵达普通跳跃无法到达的高处。
content.en: Stand on this device to automatically unleash a powerful jet that propels one to high places unreachable with normal jumping.

content.cn: 蝴蝶会将人们<@gd.key>引向附近的储藏箱</>。即使追不上也没关系，它们有时也会等待步速慢的旅人。
content.en: Butterflies can <@gd.key>lead travelers to nearby storage crates</>. Don't worry about them flying too fast. Some of them will slow down and wait for ponderous travelers.

content.cn: 贪玩的蝴蝶们有时会在<@gd.key>半路散开</>，等找回<@gd.key>所有蝴蝶</>后，它们就会继续引路。
content.en: The playful butterflies will sometimes <@gd.key>scatter halfway through</> their flight. Regroup <@gd.key>all the scattered butterflies</> and they will continue to lead the way again.

content.cn:
便捷工具键可切换为<@gd.key>盛装</>选项。
在充满液体的湖泊或水池附近时，<@gd.key>盛装</>选项下的便捷工具键会亮起，可进行<@gd.key>液体盛装</>与倾倒。
content.en: The Easy Tools button can be switched to the <@gd.key>Fill</> action. When close to a lake or filled reservoir, the <@gd.key>Fill</> action of the Easy Tools button will be highlighted. The button can then be pressed to <@gd.key>fill available containers</> or pour fluids out of filled containers.

content.cn: 便捷工具键的<@gd.key>盛装</>功能目前<@gd.key>只能在武陵地区使用</>，无法应用于四号谷地。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Fill</> function of the Easy Tools function is <@gd.key>only available in the region of Wuling</> and cannot be used in Valley IV.

content.cn:
部分场景内的液面高度可以被改变。
场景中包含的水体如果“有限”则可以被改变高度，比如池塘、蓄水池。
content.en: Certain water bodies in the map have changeable water levels. These water bodies have "limited" fluid capacities. Examples include ponds and reservoirs.

content.cn: 使用水泵将水抽出，可以使有限水体的液面高度下降。
content.en: Pumping out water from a limited-capacity water body with the Fluid Pump will lower its water level.

title.cn: 水泵抽水 - 液面下降

content.cn: 使用给水器输出液体，可以使有限水体的液面高度上升。
content.en: Supplying fluids into a limited-capacity water body with the Fluid Supply Unit will raise its water level.

title.cn: 给水器输出水 - 液面上升
title.en: Fluid Supply Unit: Raising Fluid Levels

content.cn: 塔卫二上分布着一些<@gd.key>锁闭储藏箱</>，只有找到分散在周围的三个<@gd.key>锁闭醚质</>后，才能将其解锁。
content.en: Many <@gd.key>Sealed Crates</> can be found in the world of Talos-II. To unlock a Sealed Crate, gather 3 <@gd.key>Sealing Aurylenes</> scattered nearby.

content.cn: 若要激活它，需要打开平衡总控开关，按照<@gd.key>演示顺序</>激活周围的<@gd.key>压力板</>。
content.en: To turn the main balance switch on, activate the nearby <@gd.key>pressure plates</> according to the <@gd.key>demonstrated sequence</>.

content.cn: 选剑局内特殊的平衡总控开关，如果要激活它，需要按照<@gd.key>演示顺序</>激活周围的<@gd.key>压力板</>，升起小剑桩。
content.en: Sword pells are special main balance switches in the Bureau of Swordmancers. To switch one on, activate the nearby <@gd.key>pressure plates</> according to the <@gd.key>demonstrated sequence</>.

content.cn: 武陵城外的迷踪林中，乱动的竹子会给本地居民带来困扰。当人们<@gd.key>被困迷踪林</>时，可通过附近的引导灯<@gd.key>寻找前路</>。
content.en: The randomly moving bamboo thickets of the Stragglers Grove have caused quite a bit of trouble for locals of Wuling outskirts. Those who find themselves <@gd.key>lost in the grove</> are advised to use guiding lights nearby to <@gd.key>find the proper path</>.

content.cn: 引导灯可以暂时驱散附近的少数竹林虫。<@gd.key>部分特定的区域引导灯会成组设置，需要按一定顺序点亮</>。这些成组的引导灯附近通常存在<@gd.key>提示点亮顺序的石柱</>。
content.en: Guiding lights can temporarily dispel a number of grovenymphs nearby. <@gd.key>Certain areas have sets of guiding lights that must be activated in the right sequence</>. <@gd.key>Stone pillars with clues to the correct sequence</> are often found near these sets of guiding lights.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>矿石</>是塔卫二广泛分布的重要资源，需要攻击才能够采集。
队友会协助攻击矿石。
content.en: <@gd.key>Mineral ores</> are key resources found throughout Talos-II. Mineral formations must be attacked and broken into smaller pieces for gathering. Fellow teammates will also help to break mineral formations.

content.cn: 矿石具备多种用途，可以为集成工业的发展提供支持，也可以在加工后为探索提供助力。
content.en: Mineral ores can be used to support production and growth of the AIC Factory. They can also be used for crafting special facilities to support exploration.

content.cn: 可以用研磨机将各种粉末与砂叶粉末合成新的物质，制造更高级的物品。
content.en: Grinding Units can use Sandleaf Powder with other powdered materials to make more advanced products.

content.cn: 武陵地区内规模较大的动态侵蚀，其核心所在位置附近具有<@gd.key>异常的高亮活跃表现</>。对侵蚀核心喷洒<@gd.key>液化息壤</>才能根除此处侵蚀。
content.en: Large masses of Active Blight can be found in Wuling. Such masses often exhibit <@gd.key>abnormally high levels of light emissions</> near the Blight Cores. Spray <@gd.key>Liquid Xiranite</> at the cores to completely eliminate these Blight masses.

title.cn: 武陵地区的动态侵蚀 - 大规模

content.cn: 若大规模动态侵蚀的侵蚀核心未被消除，侵蚀会很快恢复成原状。
content.en: If the Blight Core of a large Active Blight mass is not eliminated, the Blight will grow again and reach its former size.

title.cn: 大规模动态侵蚀的恢复现象

content.cn: 武陵地区内规模较小的动态侵蚀没有侵蚀核心，不会在短时间内恢复原状，直接对其喷射<@gd.key>液化息壤</>就能清理干净。
content.en: Smaller masses of Active Blight in Wuling have no Blight Cores and are incapable of regrowing themselves. Simply spray <@gd.key>Liquid Xiranite</> to clean them out.

title.cn: 武陵动态侵蚀 - 小规模
title.en: Active Blight in Wuling: Smaller Masses

content.cn: 除了可使用<@gd.key>息壤控流节点</>，为<@gd.key>射流无人机</>提供<@gd.key>液化息壤</>，还可以使用<@gd.key>集成工业系统</>大批量地制造<@gd.key>液化息壤</>，方便在武陵地区进行动态侵蚀的消除。
content.en: In addition to using <@gd.key>Xiranite flow control nodes</> to supply <@gd.key>Liquid Xiranite</> to the <@gd.key>jet drone</>, the <@gd.key>AIC Factory</> can also mass produce <@gd.key>Liquid Xiranite</> and make Active Blight elimination easier in Wuling.

title.cn: 使用液态息壤消除侵蚀

content.cn: 被动态侵蚀影响的各类装置，需要<@gd.key>消除侵蚀</>后才能正常使用。
content.en: Certain devices, machines, and mechanisms might be affected by Active Blight. The <@gd.key>Blight must be eliminated</> to use them properly.

content.cn: 武陵地区的荷叶宽大而结实。或许是受到了水中微生物的影响，当主控干员<@gd.key>站在其上</>时，荷叶能<@gd.key>发出光芒</>，并在<@gd.key>水中移动</>。
content.en: The lotuses of Wuling are known for their wide and sturdy leaves. When the controlled operator <@gd.key>stands on such a lotus leaf</>, it can <@gd.key>glow</> and <@gd.key>move across water</>. Aquatic microorganisms have been cited as the cause of such phenomena.

content.cn: 荷叶会按照固定路线移动，在<@gd.key>特定位置停留</>后会<@gd.key>返回初始位置</>。野外探索时，可以利用这种荷叶抵达平时无法抵达的地方。
content.en: A lotus leaf moves along a fixed path. <@gd.key>After reaching a specific place, it will pause for a while</> before <@gd.key>returning to its original position</>. Explorers can use these lotus leaves to reach places they could not otherwise reach.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>供电终端</>通常为大门、开关等设备供电。
当为供电终端供电后，即可控制大门或开关。
content.en: <@gd.key>Electric Nexuses</> are usually used to power gates and switches. Supply power to Electric Nexuses to control gates or switches linked to them.

content.cn: 利用感应开关，可以控制对应<@gd.key>浮块</>进行移动。
content.en: Use pressure switches to control the movement of <@gd.key>floating blocks</>.

content.cn: 主控干员踏上感应开关或将<@gd.key>悬浮箱子</>放置其上后，可以将其激活。主控干员离开或悬浮箱子移除则将其关闭。
content.en: Activate pressure switches by having the controlled operator step on it, or by placing a <@gd.key>floating crate</> on top of it. Move the controlled operator or floating crate away to deactivate it.

content.cn: <@gd.key>触碰</>后能为全队<@gd.key>恢复生命值</>，<@gd.key>已断联的干员能够直接归队</>。
content.en: <@gd.key>Touch</> healing nodules to <@gd.key>restore HP</> for the entire team and <@gd.key>revive disconnected teammates</>.

content.cn:
靠近并按下<@gd.key>交互键</>后，箱体会微微悬浮并跟随干员移动，但是无法避开障碍物。
再次按下<@gd.key>交互键</>可以放下悬浮箱子。
content.en: Approach the crate and press the <@gd.key>interact button</> to make it float and move along with the operator. Note that floating crates cannot go around obstacles. Press the <@gd.key>interact button</> again to drop the floating crate.

content.cn: 悬浮箱子可以用来作为垫脚抵达高处或作为重物启动<@gd.key>感应开关</>。
content.en: Floating crates can be used to reach higher places or as a heavy object for activating <@gd.key>pressure switches</>.

content.cn: 当悬浮箱子被移动至感应开关上方，并停止激活后，感应开关便会启动。
content.en: Move the floating crate above the pressure switch, then drop the crate onto the switch to activate it.

content.cn: 可以运输悬浮箱子的电梯。
content.en: An elevator that can transport floating crates.

content.cn: 资源回收站在解锁后会定期回收资源。当资源装满后靠近，货箱会升起，与其交互可以收取全部资源。
content.en: Unlocked Recycling Stations will regularly recycle resources. Approach a full Recycling Station to raise its material cache. Interact with it to gather all recycled resources.

content.cn: 消耗对应地区的调度券可解锁、升级资源回收站，从而激活其功能，提升所收取资源的价值。
content.en: Spend regional stock bills to unlock and upgrade Recycling Stations. This activates its recycling functions and improves the quality of the resources that can be gathered.

content.cn:
在探索中可能会碰到有设备损坏需要维修的情况。
使用管理员能力，并消耗对应材料完成维修后，设备就可以正常使用了。
content.en: Damaged facilities in need of repairs might be found during exploration. Use the Endministrator's abilities and spend the required materials to restore them to proper working order.

content.cn:
管理员可以利用自己的源石权限重构已损坏的源石电路。
拖动并旋转右侧源石电路组件到源石电路上，满足对应行列的格数需求。
content.en: Use the Endministrator's Originium authority to repair and reconstruct damaged Originium circuits. Drag and rotate Originium components from the right onto the circuit board to match the number of tiles needed by each column and row.

content.cn: 管理员在特定的位置才能回忆起如何构造一些特殊的电路组件。
content.en: There are special locations that help the Endministrator recall how to construct special Originium circuit components.

content.cn: 靠近并进行<@gd.key>交互</>后，即可搭乘绳索，<@gd.key>前往高处</>。
content.en: Approach and <@gd.key>interact</> with a rope to use it to <@gd.key>reach higher places</>.

content.cn: 部分绳索初始处于<@gd.key>不可用状态</>，需要先从<@gd.key>上方装置放下绳索后</>才可使用。
content.en: Some ropes are initially <@gd.key>unusable</>. Find the <@gd.key>rope device at the top and lower the rope</> to use it.

content.cn: 在探索中，可使用<@gd.key>扫描</>功能进行扫描，获得周围事物的信息。
content.en: During exploration, use the <@gd.key>Scan</> action to perform scanning and acquire information about nearby objects.

content.cn: 普通可交互物会被标记为<@fac.blue>蓝色</>，任务相关的物品或信息会被标记为<@gd.key>黄色</>。
content.en: Common interactables will be marked <@fac.blue>blue</> while mission-related items or information will be marked <@gd.key>yellow</>.

content.cn: 扫描采集物或矿点时，可发现被扫描的采集物或矿点的<@gd.key>规模等级</>。
content.en: Scan gatherables and mining spots to reveal their <@gd.key>resource richness</>.

content.cn:
可以使用扫描来解析动态侵蚀。
靠近动态侵蚀后，可使用扫描对范围内的侵蚀进行解析，展示其侵蚀核心和侵蚀脉络。
content.en: The scan action can decrypt Active Blight. Approach the Active Blight and perform a scan to decrypt the Blight nearby to expose the Blight Veins and Blight Core.

title.cn: 使用扫描功能解析动态侵蚀

content.cn:
协议同步器可以提供待寻找的特定目标物的大致位置，使用<@gd.key>扫描</>功能，可以探测其具体方位。
距离目标越近，扫描得到的反馈信号越强。
content.en: The Protocol Synchronizer (Protosync) can detect the presence of special target objects. Perform <@gd.key>scans</> to detect their approximate locations. Protosync responses get stronger as one approaches the objective.

content.cn: 可以使用扫描能力识别附近液体。
content.en: Perform scans to identify nearby water bodies.

content.cn:
超域能量聚集产生的奇异光团。
与其交互后，击败<@gd.key>被超域能量吸引的敌人</>，可获取奖励。
content.en: Strange masses of light emitted by a localized concentration of Æther. Interact with it and defeat the <@gd.key>enemies attracted by the Æther</> to earn rewards.

content.cn:
超域能量聚集产生的奇异光团。
扫描暂存能量淤积点可以<@gd.key>查看敌人的数量和强度</>。
content.en: Strange masses of light emitted by a localized concentration of Æther. Temporary Energy Alluvium can be scanned to <@gd.key>view the number and strengths of the enemies</>.

content.cn: 踩上活动翘板的一边时，另一边会升高。可以在倾斜时快速通过，前往更高处。
content.en: Stand on one side of the Seesaw Ramp to make the opposite end rise, then quickly run to the opposite end to reach a higher place.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>爆炸物</>可在<@gd.key>源石材料桶</>处制作。
可参照瞄准线提示，并转动视角进行瞄准，按下攻击键即可扔出。
爆炸物在接触任何物体后，即会发生爆炸，能够爆破某些石块与墙体，并对敌方造成伤害，但<@gd.key>不会</>对友方单位造成伤害。
content.en: <@gd.key>Explosives</> can be made by interacting with the <@gd.key>Barrel of Originium</>. Use the aiming guide and adjust the view to aim, then press the attack key to throw the bomb. Thrown explosives detonate upon impact and can demolish certain rocks or walls. They can also deal DMG to enemies but will <@gd.key>not damage</> friendly units.

content.cn:
由于<@gd.key>源石材料桶</>制作的爆炸物稳定性有限，需要在一定范围内才可使用。
当爆炸物远离源石材料桶一定距离，则会挥发消失。
消失之后可等待片刻，则可以在源石材料桶处重新制作。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Barrel of Originium</> only gives unstable explosives. Such explosives must be used within a short range of the barrel and will disappear if taken too far away. If that happens, just wait for a while and make another explosive by interacting with the Barrel of Originium again.

content.cn: 蒸汽以高压能形成<@gd.key>无法肉身逾越的阻挡</>。被蒸汽冲刷时不会受到伤害，但会被<@gd.key>击退</>。
content.en: Pressurized steam can create <@gd.key>impassable barriers</>. Though the steam inflicts no damage, it can <@gd.key>knock people back</>.

content.cn: 借助旧式传送带上的货物箱，能避免蒸汽的冲刷，安全到达终点。
content.en: Use cargo crates on the old conveyor belts to block the venting steam and acquire safe passage to the destination.

content.cn: 使用<@gd.key>下落攻击</>击打压力板凸起部分时，可将其激活。
content.en: Perform a <@gd.key>dive attack</> to hit the protruding part of a pressure plate and activate it.

content.cn: 有些环境中，压力板的周围会存在控制它们的<@gd.key>平衡总控开关</>，需要先触摸平衡总控开关<@gd.key>观察压力板的点亮顺序</>，再依次<@gd.key>按顺序激活</>全部压力板。
content.en: Certain areas have <@gd.key>main balance switches</> near pressure plates. Interact with the switch first. The pressure plates will light up in a particular sequence. <@gd.key>Memorize this sequence</> and <@gd.key>hit the plates accordingly</> to activate the switch.

content.cn:
便捷工具键可切换为<@gd.key>拍照</>选项。
切换后，按下便捷工具键即可快速进入<@gd.key>相机模式</>，进行拍摄。
content.en: The Easy Tools button can be switched to the <@gd.key>Camera</> action. After switching, pressing the Easy Tools button activates the <@gd.key>Camera Mode</> for taking photos.

content.cn:
在相机模式中，除了可以切换相机的参数，还可在取景时使用贴纸。
可以取景时实时预览到贴纸的位置并自由移动。
content.en: The Camera Mode has various adjustable camera options as well as stickers. These stickers can be applied and freely moved around while framing the shot.

content.cn: 在相机模式中，可以使用预设的<@gd.key>滤镜</>，对画面产生不同的效果。
content.en: The Camera Mode has many preset <@gd.key>Filters</> with different photo effects.

content.cn:
当进入<@gd.key>胆小源石虫</>附近一定半径范围内时，它便会开始逃窜。
胆小源石虫的逃窜速度非常快，且会用滚动的姿态保护自己。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Timid Originium Slug</> will start escaping when someone enters their alert radius. It is extremely fast and can even roll around to protect itself.

content.cn: 胆小源石虫沿着固定的轨迹在场景中逃窜，并会在<@gd.key>晕头转向的时候</>停下来休息。注意观察它停留的位置。
content.en: The Timid Originium Slug only runs along fixed paths and will stop to rest at nearby locations with Originium formations when it is <@gd.key>dazed</>. Take a note of its resting spots.

title.cn: 胆小源石虫的逃窜轨迹

content.cn: 当胆小源石虫休息的时候，可以<@gd.key>靠近它并按下交互键</>进行捕捉。
content.en: <@gd.key>Approach</> a resting Timid Originium Slug and <@gd.key>press the interact key</> to capture it.

content.cn: 胆小源石虫滚动时无法进行捕捉，需要判断胆小源石虫休息的位置，先于它抵达，以完成捕捉。
content.en: A rolling Timid Originium Slug cannot be captured. Study where the slug is resting, then get there before the slug arrives to complete the capture.

title.cn: 预判胆小源石虫的位置
title.en: Timid Originium Slug: Predict the Resting Place

content.cn: 武陵地区分布着一些物资箱，与其交互后，即可获取<@gd.key>盛装有清水或液化息壤的容器</>，供射流无人机等使用。
content.en: Various crates can be found throughout the region of Wuling. Open them to acquire <@gd.key>containers filled with Clean Water or Liquid Xiranite</> that can then be used by the jet drone.

content.cn: 开启百叶箱后，能获得各类<@gd.key>雕像</>。
content.en: Open instrument safes to acquire various <@gd.key>statuettes</>.

content.cn: 开启包裹后，能获得各类<@gd.key>密档</>。
content.en: Open packages to acquire various <@gd.key>classified documents</>.

content.cn: 部分天师桩周边存在着辅助其运转的<@gd.key>辅桩</>。
content.en: Some Tianshi Pillars may have <@gd.key>auxiliary pillars</> nearby to support their operations.

content.cn: 爻分阴/阳两种，分别对应两类辅桩，可与对应类型的辅桩交互，点亮主桩上的爻。
content.en: There are 2 types of auxiliary pillars marked by their divinograms: (1) Yin and (2) Yang. Interact with them to light up the divinogram on the main pillar.

content.cn: 按主桩卦象<@gd.key>自下而上的顺序</>，依次点亮辅桩，则可点亮卦象。
content.en: The main pillar divinograms are read from <@gd.key>bottom to the top</>. Illuminate the auxiliary pillars in this sequence to activate the divinograms.

content.cn: 若在灯柱中发现了感光火苗，则顺着火苗的方向就能发现光学雾影
content.en: If a light column contains photosensitive sparks, follow the direction of the sparks to find the optical fog.

content.cn: 光学雾影常与周围环境融为一体，受到攻击后即会消散
content.en: Optical fogs are often very well-blended into the environment. Attack one to dissipate it.

content.cn: 枯萎荷叶的承托能力会降低，其上<@gd.key>稍有重物便会下沉</>，如果不及时离开，就会失去落脚之处。<@gd.key>短暂时间</>后，下沉的荷叶会<@gd.key>重新浮出水面</>。
content.en: A wilted lotus leaf cannot carry as much load and will <@gd.key>slowly sink when something heavy is placed on it</>. The leaf can no longer be stepped upon after it completely sinks. <@gd.key>After a while</>, however, the lotus leaf will <@gd.key>slowly re-surface</>.

content.cn:
获得工业爆炸物后，可以将便捷工具键切换为<@gd.key>工业爆炸物</>选项。
切换后，按下便捷工具键即可快捷使用。
content.en: After getting Industrial Explosives, the Easy Tools button can be switched to the <@gd.key>Bomb</> action. Switching to this action allows quick and easy use of Industrial Explosives by simply pressing the Easy Tools button.

content.cn: 开启贩售机后，能获得各类<@gd.key>罐装物</>。
content.en: Open auto-vendors to acquire various <@gd.key>jarred specimens</>.

content.cn: 利用此类型开关，可以控制附近水体的水位高低
content.en: These valves are switches that can control water levels of a nearby water body.

content.cn: 通过射流无人机喷射阵列稳定桩，帮助稳定部分息壤设备；维持<@gd.key>合适的喷射频率</>，确保稳定桩温度在<@gd.key>需要的温度区间</>内，从而<@gd.key>累积进度</>
content.en: Use the jet drone to spray array stabilizing rods to stabilize various Xiranite facilities. Maintain a <@gd.key>certain spraying rate</> to keep the stabilizing rod <@gd.key>within the required temperature range</> and build up <@gd.key>stabilization progress</>.

content.cn: 需要的温度区间会随时发生变化，请灵活地调整喷射频率来与之匹配。
content.en: The required temperature range may keep changing. Adjust the jet drone spraying rate to match the range.

content.cn: 需水方块是一种供能装置，当需水方块过载损坏时，其配套装置会无法正常运作。可以通过<@gd.key>射流无人机</>将其修复。
content.en: Hydrocubes are a type of power generators. A device linked to an overloaded or damaged hydrocube will fail to function. Use a <@gd.key>jet drone</> to fix such hydrocubes.

content.cn: 需水方块在过载时会悬浮在半空，您可以使用<@gd.key>射流无人机</>对准其<@gd.key>橙黄色指示灯部位</>喷射<@gd.key>清水</>，直至<@gd.key>指示灯转绿</>
content.en: Overloaded hydrocubes will float in mid-air. Use a <@gd.key>jet drone</> to spray <@gd.key>Clean Water</> at the <@gd.key>orange-yellow indicator lights</> until the <@gd.key>lights glow green</>.

content.cn: 一些需水方块可能会在过载悬浮时<@gd.key>胡乱移动或旋转</>。需要寻找<@gd.key>正确的角度或时机</>进行修复。
content.en: Some overloaded and floating hydrocubes may also <@gd.key>move or rotate randomly</>. Repair sprays must be made at the <@gd.key>correct timing or proper angles</> of jet drone spraying.

content.cn:
便捷工具键可切换为<@gd.key>喷洒</>选项。
切换后，按下便捷工具键即可快速使用<@gd.key>射流无人机</>。
选择背包中消耗的液体后，即可通过<@gd.key>射流无人机</>进行液体喷洒。
content.en: The Easy Tools button can be switched to the <@gd.key>Spray</> action. After switching, press the Easy Tools button to quickly activate the <@gd.key>Jet Drone</>. Select a fluid in the Backpack and then use the <@gd.key>Jet Drone</> to spray the fluid.

content.cn: 铁叶转轮通常控制着其他机关。使用<@gd.key>射流无人机</>向其喷射液体后，铁叶转轮能够<@gd.key>控制对应机关的运转</>。部分机关需要<@gd.key>持续向铁叶转轮喷射液体</>才能维持运转。
content.en: Ferrium turbines are usually used to control other mechanisms. Use a <@gd.key>jet drone</> to spray ferrium turbines so they start turning and <@gd.key>control the operations of other linked mechanisms</>. Certain mechanisms can only be activated by <@gd.key>continuously spraying the ferrium turbine for a while</>.

content.cn: 转轮机关的指示灯为<@gd.key>红色</>时，代表着它正处于<@gd.key>关闭状态</>。指示灯为<@gd.key>绿光</>时，代表着它在<@gd.key>正常运转</>。
content.en: When the indicator light of a rotating mechanism glows <@gd.key>red</>, it is <@gd.key>not working at all</>. If the light glows <@gd.key>green</>, the mechanism is <@gd.key>working properly</>.

content.cn: 如需使转轮机关恢复正常运转，可以通过<@gd.key>射流无人机</>向其持续喷射液体。
content.en: To get a rotating mechanism to work properly, use a <@gd.key>jet drone</> and keep spraying fluids at it.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>敲打机关</>，使其旋转。机关的旋转会<@gd.key>带动水渠的旋转</>。
水渠旋转至<@gd.key>正确角度</>后，对应的机关会自动收起。
content.en: <@gd.key>Attack and hit the canal mechanism</> to rotate it. This will also <@gd.key>rotate the canal</> linked to it. Once the canal is rotated to the <@gd.key>correct angle</>, the canal mechanism will automatically retract.

content.cn: 依次使水渠正确旋转、<@gd.key>引导水流浇到水车上</>，可开启机关，发现新的通路。
content.en: Rotate the canals to the correct angles in the correct sequence to <@gd.key>direct the flow of water</> to the waterwheel, activate a mechanism, and open up a new path.

content.cn:
在谷地像差的正式探索中，紊乱值会随时间自然增长。
并且与沉积晶石的核心交互、在进入作战状态，都会增长紊乱值。
当紊乱值达到上限时，会强制进入结算并退出谷地像差
content.en: Derangement gradually increases with time while exploring the Valley's Aberrants. Derangement also increases when interacting with Precipitation Crystals cores or entering combat. When the Derangement limit is reached, the team will be forcibly extracted from the Valley's Aberrants and the exploration attempt will be immediately tallied.

content.cn:
在谷地像差中，存在一些<@gd.key>安全区</>，可通过<@gd.key>黄色光效</>的区域判断。
当处于安全区范围内时，紊乱值不会随时间自然增加。
content.en: <@gd.key>Safe zones</> can be found in Valley's Aberrants. They can be identified with their <@gd.key>yellow lighting effects</>. Derangement will stop increasing when staying in a safe zone.

content.cn:
谷地像差由多个区域构成，不同区域的紊乱值自然增长速度不同。
通常在越后期的区域探索，紊乱值增长得越快。
content.en: Valley's Aberrants comprise multiple areas. Derangement increases at different rates in different areas. Derangement tends to increase faster when exploring latter areas.

content.cn: 在谷地像差中，存在大量<@gd.key>沉积晶石</>，将其破坏后会暴露其<@gd.key>核心</>，与之交互可获得<@gd.key>沉积结核</>。
content.en: Many <@gd.key>Precipitation Crystals</> exist in Valley's Aberrants. Smash the crystal to expose its <@gd.key>core</> and interact with it to get <@gd.key>precipitation nodules</>.

content.cn:
探索中获得的<@gd.key>沉积结核</>会保存在<@gd.key>隔绝封装器</>中。
隔绝封装器具有一定的<@gd.key>容量上限</>，达到上限时，便无法获得更多<@gd.key>沉积结核</>。
content.en: <@gd.key>Precipitation nodules</> found during exploration are stored in the <@gd.key>Isolation Container</>. The Isolation Container has a <@gd.key>limited capacity</> and cannot hold more <@gd.key>precipitation nodules</> when full.

content.cn: 在<@gd.key>委托与辅助探测技术</>中，查看当前在<@gd.key>蚀像寻遗</>中可接取及完成的委托。
content.en: Go to the <@gd.key>Commissions and Exploration Support Tech</> to accept and complete various <@gd.key>Etchspace Salvage</> commissions.

content.cn:
完成指定的委托后，可解锁特定的<@gd.key>辅助探测技术</>。
<@gd.key>辅助探测技术</>可为谷地像差中的探索提供各种增益。
content.en: Complete commissions to unlock specified <@gd.key>Exploration Support Tech</> that can offer various useful buffs for exploring the Valley's Aberrants.

content.cn: 在谷地像差中，存在许多可交互的<@gd.key>储物点</>，与之交互后可获得<@gd.key>沉积具象物</>，同时也会增长紊乱值。
content.en: The Valley's Aberrants have many <@gd.key>storage points</>. Interact with them to acquire <@gd.key>Precipitation Manifests</> but this will also increase Derangement.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>沉积具象物</>同样会保存在<@gd.key>隔绝封装器</>中。
完成探索，成功带出<@gd.key>沉积具象物</>后，其可用于各种研究用途、提升在在谷地像差中的各项能力。
content.en: <@gd.key>Precipitation manifests</> are also stored in the <@gd.key>Isolation Container</>. <@gd.key>Precipitation manifests</> successfully brought from exploration attempts can be used for research and improve various abilities in the Valley's Aberrants.

content.cn: 可使用<@gd.key>大型弹射装置</>进行一次<@gd.key>超长距离的跳跃</>，抵达普通跳跃无法触达的高处。站立在其上并按下<@gd.key>跳跃键</>即可使用。
content.en: Use <@gd.key>large bounce devices</> to perform <@gd.key>super jumps</> and reach heights that could not be attained by normal jumping. Simply stand on the bounce device and press the <@gd.key>jump button</> to use it.

content.cn: 这些桶中储藏着易燃、易爆物质，在被<@gd.key>爆炸物</>引爆后，会引发<@gd.key>周边其他的易爆物储藏桶爆炸</>。爆炸会对<@gd.key>周围的敌人造成伤害</>，且能<@gd.key>毁坏周边的可爆破物</>。
content.en: Highly flammable and explosive materials are stored in these barrels. When detonated by <@gd.key>explosives</>, the explosion can <@gd.key>set off similar barrels nearby</>, <@gd.key>damage enemies</>, and even <@gd.key>take out destructible objects nearby</>.

content.cn: 武陵地区设有以息壤材料修筑的桥，激活开关后，这些桥能够连通断开的区域。
content.en: Xiranite bridges have been constructed in the region of Wuling. Activate the switches to repair these bridges and form paths to previously inaccessible areas.

content.cn:
在成功激活息壤控流节点后，可将射流无人机与其连接。
在息壤控流节点的范围内，可使用其中的<@gd.key>液化息壤</>为射流无人机提供液体。
content.en: Once a Xiranite flow control node is activated, it can continuously refill a jet drone within range with <@gd.key>Liquid Xiranite</>.

content.cn: 液化息壤是以液体形式存在的息壤。目前可用于消除泥侵蚀、激活息壤装置。
content.en: Essentially Xiranite in liquid form. It can be used to eliminate Blight mudflows and activate Xiranite facilities.

content.cn: 接下来，武陵地区所有的息壤控流节点，都可以在管理员激活后使用。
content.en: All Xiranite flow control nodes in Wuling can now be activated and used, Endministrator.

content.cn:
带有<@ba.airborne>击飞</>的技能会使敌人<#ba.noguard>破防</>。
如果敌人已经<#ba.noguard>破防</>，则会真正触发<@ba.airborne>击飞</>的异常效果：叠加一层<#ba.noguard>破防</>（最多4层），造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>，累积一定<@ba.poise>失衡值</>，并使弱小的敌人浮空。
content.en: Skills with the <@ba.airborne>Lift</> effect first make the enemy <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>. If the enemy is already <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>, such skills then apply the actual Physical Status of <@ba.airborne>Lifted</>: Adds 1 more <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stack (max: 4), deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and some <@ba.poise>Stagger</>, and lifts a weak enemy into mid-air.

content.cn: 一些技能带有强制<@ba.airborne>击飞</>：无论敌人是否<#ba.noguard>破防</>，直接触发<@ba.airborne>击飞</>。
content.en: Some skills can forcibly apply <@ba.airborne>Lift</>: Enemies are directly <@ba.airborne>Lifted</> into mid-air whether they are <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</> or not.

content.cn: 部分敌人拥有减免受到的伤害的能力。
content.en: Some enemies have the ability to take less damage.

content.cn: 观察他们的行动。寻找破绽、破除防御后再发起攻击，效果更佳。
content.en: Observe their actions, find their weaknesses, and take down their defenses before launching the attack to improve effectiveness.

content.cn:
敌人施放一些技能时会进入<@ba.key>蓄力</>状态，期间身上会有<@ba.key>警示光圈</>。
此时使用<@ba.key>技能</>对其造成伤害可以将其<@ba.key>打断</>，敌人会停止行动并累积<@ba.poise>失衡值</>。
content.en: Enemies may enter a <@ba.key>charging</> state when casting certain skills. This is indicated by a <@ba.key>red circle</> around them. Dealing DMG to an enemy in charging state with <@ba.key>skills</> will <@ba.key>interrupt</> them. Successful interruption stops the enemy's action and deals <@ba.poise>Stagger</> to it.

content.cn:
部分敌人在刚进入蓄力状态时，警示光圈为<@ba.key>白色</>，此时无法打断。
需要等到警示光圈<@ba.key>变为红色后</>，才可以打断。
content.en: For some enemies, a white circle appears first when they first enter a <@ba.key>charging state</>. The enemy cannot be interrupted during this time. Wait for the white circle to <@ba.key>turn red</>, then interrupt them.

content.cn:
当敌人首次受到<#ba.physicalstatus>物理异常</>时，不会直接触发异常效果，而是进入<@ba.noguard>破防</>状态。
<@ba.noguard>破防</>状态可以被<#ba.airborne>击飞</>和<#ba.knockdown>倒地</>叠加（最多4层），且会被<#ba.crush>猛击</>和<#ba.fracture>碎甲</><#ba.consume>消耗</>。
content.en: Hitting an enemy for the first time with a skill with <#ba.physicalstatus>Physical Status</> applies <@ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> instead of the actual Physical Status. A <@ba.noguard>Vulnerable</> enemy can be <#ba.airborne>Lifted</> and <#ba.knockdown>Knocked Down</> to add more Vulnerability stacks (up to 4). Hitting a Vulnerable enemy with <#ba.crush>Crush</> or <#ba.fracture>Breach</> will <#ba.consume>consume</> the Vulnerability stacks.

content.cn:
带有<@ba.fracture>碎甲</>的技能会使敌人<#ba.noguard>破防</>。
如果敌人已经<#ba.noguard>破防</>，则会真正触发<@ba.fracture>碎甲</>的异常效果：<#ba.consume>消耗</>目标所有<#ba.noguard>破防</>层数，造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>，使其在一段时间内受到的<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>提高。
content.en:
Skills with the <@ba.fracture>Breach</> effect first make the enemy <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>. 
If the enemy is already <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>, then apply the actual Physical Status of <@ba.fracture>Breached</>: <#ba.consume>Consumes</> all active <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stacks, deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>, and makes the target take more <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> for a certain duration.

content.cn: <#ba.consume>消耗</>的<#ba.noguard>破防</>层数越多，<@ba.fracture>碎甲</>的伤害越高，持续时间越长，使敌人受到的<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>提高效果越强。
content.en: By <#ba.consume>consuming</> more <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stacks, <@ba.fracture>Breach</> deals more DMG, lasts longer, and makes the enemy take even more <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> when active.

content.cn:
一些技能会对敌人叠加<@ba.cryst>寒冷附着</>（最多4层）。
处于<@ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>状态的敌人再次被施加<@ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>时，会触发<#ba.crystburst>寒冷爆发</>。
处于其他<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>状态的敌人被施加<@ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>时，会触发<#ba.frozen>冻结</>。
content.en:
Some skills can apply <@ba.cryst>Cryo Infliction</> stacks (max: 4) to enemies. To an enemy with <@ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</>, applying another <@ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> triggers a <#ba.crystburst>Cryo Burst</>.
To an enemy with a non-Cryo <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</>, applying <@ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> triggers <#ba.frozen>Solidification</>.

content.cn: 处于<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>状态的敌人再次被施加<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>时，会叠加一层<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>（最多4层），并受到<@ba.cryst>寒冷爆发</>：短暂延迟后受到<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>。
content.en: To an enemy with <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</>, applying another <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> adds 1 more stack of <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> (max stacks: 4) and triggers <@ba.cryst>Cryo Burst</>, which deals <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</> after a short delay.

content.cn:
干员在<@ba.key>满足一定条件</>时，可以发动自己的连携技。
每个干员的连携技条件不同。
了解每个干员的连携技条件，多多打出连携效果是战斗的关键。
content.en: Operators can cast their combo skills when <@ba.key>certain criteria are met</>. Every operator has different combo skill triggers. Master these combo skill trigger criteria to unleash multiple combo skills in combat.

content.cn:
干员在<@ba.key>满足一定条件</>时，可以发动自己的连携技。
每个干员的连携技条件不同。
了解每个干员的连携技条件，多多打出连携效果是战斗的关键。
content.en: Operators can cast their combo skills when <@ba.key>certain criteria are met</>. Every operator has different combo skill triggers. Master these combo skill trigger criteria to unleash multiple combo skills in combat.

content.cn: 施放连携技<@ba.key>不需要技力</>，但施放后有一定<@ba.key>冷却时间</>，期间无法再发动。
content.en: Combo skills <@ba.key>do not cost any Skill Points (SP)</> to cast. However, combo skills have <@ba.key>cooldowns</> and cannot be cast until the cooldown timer ends.

content.cn: 施放连携技<@ba.key>不需要技力</>，但施放后有一定<@ba.key>冷却时间</>，期间无法再发动。
content.en: Combo skills <@ba.key>do not cost any Skill Points (SP)</> to cast. However, combo skills have <@ba.key>cooldowns</> and cannot be cast until the cooldown timer ends.

content.cn:
全队的<@ba.key>下个战技或终结技</>的伤害提高，对战技的提高幅度更大，触发后效果清空。
<@ba.info>同类效果可以叠加（最多4层），但效果有衰减。</>
content.en: <@ba.key>Next battle skill or ultimate</> cast by the team consumes the Link buff and deals more DMG, with battle skills getting a higher increase. <@ba.info>Effects of the same type can stack (max: 4), but with diminishing returns.</>

content.cn:
处于其他<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>状态的敌人，再被施加<#ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>时，会<#ba.consume>消耗</>所有<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>，受到一次初始<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>，并进入<@ba.burning>燃烧</>状态。
<@ba.burning>燃烧</>状态下，敌人每秒受到<@ba.fire>灼热属性</>的<#ba.dot>持续伤害</>。伤害量基于触发<@ba.burning>燃烧</>的干员的攻击力。
content.en: To an enemy with a non-Heat <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</>, applying <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</> <#ba.consume>consumes</> all <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Inflictions</>, deals 1 initial hit of <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</>, and triggers the Arts Reaction of <@ba.burning>Combustion</>. An enemy with <@ba.burning>Combustion</> suffers <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</> every second ( a form of <#ba.dot>DMG over time</>). The amount of DMG dealt is based on the ATK of the operator who triggered the <@ba.burning>Combustion</>.

content.cn:
触发<@ba.burning>燃烧</>时，<#ba.consume>消耗</>的<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>层数越多，初始伤害和<@ba.burning>燃烧</>的伤害越高。
强制施加的<@ba.burning>燃烧</>不会有初始伤害。
content.en: When triggering <@ba.burning>Combustion</>, <#ba.consume>consuming</> more <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</> stacks deals higher DMG in the initial hit and higher <@ba.burning>Combustion</> DMG. Forcibly applied <@ba.burning>Combustion</> does not deal the initial hit of DMG.

content.cn:
处于其他<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>状态的敌人，再被施加<#ba.pulseinflict>电磁附着</>时，会<#ba.consume>消耗</>所有<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>，受到一次初始<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害</>，并进入<@ba.conduct>导电</>状态。
<@ba.conduct>导电</>状态下，敌人受到的<#ba.spelldmg>法术伤害</>会提高。
content.en: To an enemy with non-Electric <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</>, applying <#ba.pulseinflict>Electric Infliction</> <#ba.consume>consumes</> all <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Inflictions</>, deals 1 initial hit of <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG</>, and triggers the Arts Reaction of <@ba.conduct>Electrification</>. An enemy with <@ba.conduct>Electrification</> takes more <#ba.spelldmg>Arts DMG</>.

content.cn:
触发<@ba.conduct>导电</>时，<#ba.consume>消耗</>的<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>层数越多，初始伤害越高，<@ba.conduct>导电</>持续时间越长，敌人受到<#ba.spelldmg>法术伤害</>提高的效果越强。
强制施加的<@ba.conduct>导电</>不会有初始伤害。
content.en: When triggering <@ba.conduct>Electrification</>, <#ba.consume>consuming</> more <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</> stacks deals higher DMG in the initial hit, extends the duration of <@ba.conduct>Electrification</>, and makes the enemy take even more <#ba.spelldmg>Arts DMG</>. Forcibly applied <@ba.conduct>Electrification</> does not deal the initial hit of DMG.

content.cn: 状态以特殊的方式提前结束（如<#ba.crush>猛击</>消耗<#ba.noguard>破防</>状态，<#ba.burning>燃烧</>消耗<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>状态）。
content.en: Various Physical and Arts debuffs can be ended early. For example, <#ba.crush>Crush</> consumes <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> debuffs, while <#ba.burning>Combustion</> consumes <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</> debuffs.

content.cn:
处于其他<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>状态的敌人，再被施加<#ba.naturalinflict>自然附着</>时，会<#ba.consume>消耗</>所有附着，受到一次初始<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>，并进入<@ba.corrupt>腐蚀</>状态：一段时间内全属性抗性逐渐下降，该效果存在上限。
如果刷新<@ba.corrupt>腐蚀</>状态，会维持之前的抗性下降。
content.en:
To an enemy with non-Nature <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</>, applying <#ba.naturalinflict>Nature Infliction</> <#ba.consume>consumes</> all Arts Inflictions, deals 1 initial hit of <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</>, and triggers the Arts Reaction of <@ba.corrupt>Corrosion</>: Resistance to all elements decreases over time until it reaches a certain minimum.
Refreshing the <@ba.corrupt>Corrosion</> does not change the amount of resistance reduction.

content.cn:
触发<@ba.corrupt>腐蚀</>时，<#ba.consume>消耗</>的<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>层数越多，初始伤害越高，<@ba.corrupt>腐蚀</>每秒降低的全属性抗性越多，降低全属性抗性效果的上限越高。
强制造成的<@ba.corrupt>腐蚀</>不会有初始伤害。
content.en:
When triggering <@ba.corrupt>Corrosion</>, <#ba.consume>consuming</> more <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</> stacks deals higher DMG in the initial hit, makes <@ba.corrupt>Corrosion</> reduce more resistance against all elements per second, and reduce the resistance against all elements to an even lower minimum.
Forcibly applied <@ba.corrupt>Corrosion</> does not deal the initial hit of DMG.

content.cn:
可以通过<@ba.key>冲刺</>，来躲避敌人的攻击。
冲刺不会打断普通攻击连段。
在敌人攻击瞬间冲刺，会触发<@ba.key>极限闪避</>，恢复少量技力。
content.en: Use <@ba.key>dash</> to dodge enemy attacks. Dodging does not interrupt the basic attack sequence. A dodge performed at the moment of enemy attack triggers a <@ba.key>Perfect Dodge</> that recovers some SP.

content.cn:
<@ba.key>冲刺</>需要消耗<@ba.key>体力</>。体力随时间恢复。
多多收集醚质，在协议传送点处提交，可以提升<@ba.key>体力上限</>。
content.en: <@ba.key>Dash</> dodging consumes <@ba.key>Stamina</>. Stamina recovers with time. Collect Aurylenes and submit them at TP Points to raise the <@ba.key>Stamina limit</>.

content.cn: 清除干员的特定异常状态。
content.en: Removes specific debuffs from the operator.

content.cn:
伤害分为<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>、<@ba.key>法术伤害</>、<@ba.ether>超域伤害</>。
其中，<@ba.key>法术伤害</>又分为<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>、<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害</>、<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>、<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>。
content.en: Damage can be divided into <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>, <@ba.key>Arts DMG</>, and <@ba.ether>Æther DMG</>. <@ba.key>Arts DMG</> can be further divided into <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</>, <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG</>, <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</>, and <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</>.

content.cn:
一定时间内目标<@ba.key>造成的特定属性的伤害提高</>（数值代表提高的幅度）。
<@ba.info>同类效果可以叠加。</>
content.en: Amped targets temporarily <@ba.key>deal more DMG of the element it is Amped for</>. The number represents the degree of increase. <@ba.info>Effects of the same type can stack.</>

content.cn: 对处于<@ba.poise>失衡</>状态的敌人第一次使用普通攻击时，会处决该敌人，造成大量伤害并恢复一定<@ba.key>技力</>。
content.en: The first basic attack dealt to a <@ba.poise>Staggered enemy</> will be a Finisher that causes massive DMG and recovers some <@ba.key>Skill Points (SP)</>.

content.cn:
一些技能会对敌人叠加<@ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>（最多4层）。
处于<@ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>状态的敌人再次被施加<@ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>时，会触发<#ba.fireburst>灼热爆发</>。
处于其他<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>状态的敌人被施加<@ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>时，会触发<#ba.burning>燃烧</>。
content.en:
Some skills can apply <@ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</> stacks (max: 4) to enemies. To an enemy with <@ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</>, applying another <@ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</> triggers a <#ba.fireburst>Heat Burst</>.
To an enemy with a non-Heat <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</>, applying <@ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</> triggers <#ba.burning>Combustion</>.

content.cn: 处于<#ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>状态的敌人再次被施加<#ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>时，会叠加一层<#ba.fireinflict>灼热附着</>（最多4层），并受到<@ba.fire>灼热爆发</>：短暂延迟后受到<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>。
content.en: To an enemy with <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</>, applying another <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</> adds 1 more stack of <#ba.fireinflict>Heat Infliction</> (max stacks: 4) and triggers <@ba.fire>Heat Burst</>, which deals <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</> after a short delay.

content.cn:
处于其他<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>的敌人，再被施加<#ba.crystinflict>寒冷附着</>时，会<#ba.consume>消耗</>所有附着，受到一次初始<@ba.cryst>寒冷伤害</>，并进入<@ba.frozen>冻结</>。
<@ba.frozen>冻结</>状态下，弱小的敌人无法行动。
content.en: To an enemy with non-Cryo <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</>, applying <#ba.crystinflict>Cryo Infliction</> <#ba.consume>consumes</> all Arts Inflictions, deals 1 initial hit of <@ba.cryst>Cryo DMG</>, and triggers the Arts Reaction of <@ba.frozen>Solidification</>. A weak enemy with <@ba.frozen>Solidification</> cannot move.

content.cn: 对处于<@ba.frozen>冻结</>状态的敌人施加<#ba.noguard>破防</>或<#ba.physicalstatus>物理异常</>时会触发<@ba.crystbreak>碎冰</>：<#ba.consume>消耗</>敌人<#ba.frozen>冻结</>状态，并造成大量<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。
content.en: To an enemy with active <@ba.frozen>Solidification</>, applying <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> or <#ba.physicalstatus>Physical Statuses</> triggers <@ba.crystbreak>Shatter</>: <#ba.consume>Consumes</> the enemy's <#ba.frozen>Solidification</> and deals massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>.

content.cn:
触发<@ba.frozen>冻结</>时，<#ba.consume>消耗</>的<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>层数越多，初始伤害越高，<@ba.frozen>冻结</>持续时间越长，<@ba.crystbreak>碎冰</>的伤害越高。
强制施加的<@ba.frozen>冻结</>不会有初始伤害。
content.en: When triggering <@ba.frozen>Solidification</>, <#ba.consume>consuming</> more <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</> stacks deals higher DMG in the initial hit, extends the duration of <@ba.frozen>Solidification</>, and deals more DMG upon <@ba.crystbreak>Shatter</>. Forcibly applied <@ba.frozen>Solidification</> does not deal the initial hit of DMG.

content.cn:
一定时间内目标<@ba.key>受到的所有伤害降低</>（数值代表降低的幅度）。
<@ba.info>同类效果会取效果最高值。</>
content.en: Protected targets temporarily <@ba.key>enjoy DMG Reduction against all types of DMG</>. The number represents the degree of reduction. <@ba.info>When there are multiple effects of the same type, only the most powerful applies.</>

content.cn:
普通攻击的<@ba.key>最后一段</>会进行强力一击，称为<@ba.key>重击</>。
主控干员的重击还会恢复<@ba.key>技力</>，并累积<@ba.poise>失衡值</>。
content.en: The <@ba.key>last basic attack sequence</> is called the <@ba.key>Final Strike</>. When performed by the controlled operator, the Final Strike recovers <@ba.key>Skill Points (SP)</> and deals <@ba.poise>Stagger</>.

content.cn:
带有<@ba.crush>猛击</>的技能会使敌人<#ba.noguard>破防</>。
如果敌人已经<#ba.noguard>破防</>，则会真正触发<@ba.crush>猛击</>的异常效果：<#ba.consume>消耗</>目标所有<#ba.noguard>破防</>层数，造成大量<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>。
content.en: Skills with the <@ba.crush>Crush</> effect first make the enemy <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>. If the enemy is already <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>, such skills then apply the actual Physical Status of <@ba.crush>Crushed</>: <#ba.consume>Consumes</> all active <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stacks of the target to deal massive <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</>.

content.cn:
<#ba.consume>消耗</>的<#ba.noguard>破防</>层数越多，<@ba.crush>猛击</>的伤害越高。
先用<#ba.airborne>击飞</>、<#ba.knockdown>倒地</>叠加<#ba.noguard>破防</>层数，最后触发<@ba.crush>猛击</>，可以打出大量伤害。
content.en: By <#ba.consume>consuming</> more <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stacks, <@ba.crush>Crush</> can deal more DMG. Use skills with <#ba.airborne>Lift</> or <#ba.knockdown>Knock Down</> effect to add <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stacks, then apply <@ba.crush>Crush</> to deal massive DMG.

content.cn:
带有<@ba.knockdown>倒地</>的技能会使敌人<#ba.noguard>破防</>。
如果敌人已经<#ba.noguard>破防</>，则会真正触发<@ba.knockdown>倒地</>的异常效果：叠加一层<#ba.noguard>破防</>（最多4层），造成<@ba.pd>物理伤害</>，累积一定<@ba.poise>失衡值</>，并将弱小的敌人击倒。
content.en:
Skills with the <@ba.knockdown>Knock Down</> effect first make the enemy <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>. 
If the enemy is already <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</>, such skills then apply the actual Physical Status of <@ba.knockdown>Knocked Down</>: Adds 1 more <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> stack (max: 4), deals <@ba.pd>Physical DMG</> and some <@ba.poise>Stagger</>, and knocks down weak enemies.

content.cn: 一些技能带有强制<@ba.knockdown>倒地</>：无论敌人是否<#ba.noguard>破防</>，直接触发<@ba.knockdown>倒地</>。
content.en: Some skills can forcibly apply <@ba.knockdown>Knock Down</>: Enemies are directly <@ba.knockdown>Knocked Down</> to the ground whether they are <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</> or not.

content.cn:
按下锁定键<action=battle_camera_lock>，视角将锁定在目标身上。
滑动鼠标滚轮<action=battle_camera_lock>可以切换锁定目标。
再次按下锁定键<action=battle_camera_lock>，会取消锁定。
content.en: Press the lock-on key <action=battle_camera_lock> to lock the view on the target. Scroll the mouse wheel <action=battle_camera_lock> to switch the lock-on to another target. Press the lock-on key <action=battle_camera_lock> again to cancel the lock-on.

content.cn:
按下锁定键<action=battle_camera_lock>，视角将锁定在目标身上。
推动<image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6>操作杆可以切换锁定目标。
再次按下锁定键<action=battle_camera_lock>，会取消锁定。
content.en:
Press the lock-on button <action=battle_camera_lock> to lock the view on the target. 
Move the <image="KeyIcon/Playstation/icon_playstation_rightstick" scale=1.6> stick to switch the lock-on to another target. 
Press the lock-on button <action=battle_camera_lock> again to cancel the lock-on.

content.cn:
按下锁定键，视角将锁定在目标身上。
左右滑动屏幕可以切换锁定目标。
再次按下锁定键，会取消锁定。
content.en:
Tap the lock-on button to lock the view on the target. 
Swipe the screen left or right to switch the lock-on to another target. 
Tap the lock-on button again to cancel the lock-on.

content.cn: 在<@gd.key>设置-操控</>界面中，可以依据游玩习惯，切换<@gd.key>战斗相机修正：自动锁定</>设置。
content.en: Go to the <@gd.key>Settings - Controls</> screen and switch <@gd.key>Combat Camera Correction: Auto-lock</> on or off based on your play style.

content.cn:
一些技能会对敌人叠加<@ba.natur>自然附着</>（最多4层）。
处于<@ba.naturalinflict>自然附着</>状态的敌人再次被施加<@ba.naturalinflict>自然附着</>时，会触发<#ba.naturalburst>自然爆发</>。
处于其他<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>状态的敌人被施加<@ba.naturalinflict>自然附着</>时，会触发<#ba.corrupt>腐蚀</>。
content.en:
Some skills can apply <@ba.natur>Nature Infliction</> stacks (max: 4) to enemies. To an enemy with <@ba.naturalinflict>Nature Infliction</>, applying another <@ba.naturalinflict>Nature Infliction</> triggers a <#ba.naturalburst>Nature Burst</>.
To an enemy with a non-Nature <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</>, applying <@ba.naturalinflict>Nature Infliction</> triggers <#ba.corrupt>Corrosion</>.

content.cn: 处于<#ba.naturalinflict>自然附着</>状态的敌人再次被施加<#ba.naturalinflict>自然附着</>时，会叠加一层<#ba.naturalinflict>自然附着</>（最多4层），并受到<@ba.natur>自然爆发</>：短暂延迟后受到<@ba.natur>自然伤害</>。
content.en: To an enemy with <#ba.naturalinflict>Nature Infliction</>, applying another <#ba.naturalinflict>Nature Infliction</> adds 1 more stack of <#ba.naturalinflict>Nature Infliction</> (max stacks: 4) and triggers <@ba.natur>Nature Burst</>, which deals <@ba.natur>Nature DMG</> after a short delay.

content.cn: 连续<@ba.key>按下</>，或者<@ba.key>按住</>攻击键，可以进行普通攻击连段。
content.en: Repeatedly <@ba.key>press</> or <@ba.key>long-press</> the attack button to perform basic attack sequences one after another.

content.cn: 连续<@ba.key>按下</>，或者<@ba.key>按住</>攻击键，可以进行普通攻击连段。
content.en: Repeatedly <@ba.key>press</> or <@ba.key>press and hold</> the attack button to perform basic attack sequences one after another.

content.cn: 连续<@ba.key>按下</>，或者<@ba.key>按住</>攻击键，可以进行普通攻击连段。
content.en: Repeatedly <@ba.key>tap</> or <@ba.key>tap and hold</> the attack button to perform basic attack sequences one after another.

content.cn:
干员可以消耗技力来施放战技。
战技<@ba.key>没有冷却时间</>，可以根据战况，合理选择要施放的战技。
content.en: Operators can spend Skill Points (SP) to cast their battle skills. Battle skills have <@ba.key>no cooldown</> and can be cast whenever there are enough SP.

content.cn:
一些敌人的技能会给干员施加<@ba.fire>灼热附着</>。
达到4层时，干员会进入<@ba.fire>燃烧</>状态：一段时间内，持续受到无视防御力的<@ba.fire>灼热伤害</>。
content.en: Certain enemy skills can apply stacks of <@ba.fire>Heat Infliction</> to operators. At 4 stacks, the operator becomes <@ba.fire>Combusted</>: Temporarily suffer continuous <@ba.fire>Heat DMG</> that ignores DEF.

content.cn:
一些敌人的技能会给干员施加<@ba.pulse>电磁附着</>。
达到4层时，干员会进入<@ba.pulse>导电</>状态：短暂眩晕，且一段时间内，受到的<#ba.spelldmg>法术伤害</>提高。
content.en: Certain enemy skills can apply stacks of <@ba.pulse>Electric Infliction</> to operators. At 4 stacks, the operator becomes <@ba.pulse>Electrified</>: Temporarily stunned and take more <#ba.spelldmg>Arts DMG</> for a certain duration.

content.cn:
一些敌人的技能会给干员施加<@ba.natur>自然附着</>。
达到4层时，干员会进入<@ba.natur>腐蚀</>状态：一段时间内无法冲刺，且移动速度降低。
content.en: Certain enemy skills can apply stacks of <@ba.natur>Nature Infliction</> to operators. At 4 stacks, the operator becomes <@ba.natur>Corroded</>: Cannot dash and suffer movement speed reduction for a certain duration.

content.cn:
一些敌人的技能会给干员施加<@ba.cryst>寒冷附着</>。
达到4层时，干员会进入<@ba.cryst>冻结</>状态：一段时间内无法行动。
content.en: Certain enemy skills can apply stacks of <@ba.cryst>Cryo Infliction</> to operators. At 4 stacks, the operator becomes <@ba.cryst>Solidified</>: Cannot move for a certain duration.

content.cn: 大部分技能及主控干员的<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>命中敌人时，会累积敌人的<@ba.poise>失衡值</>。
content.en: The controlled operator's <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> and most skills also deal <@ba.poise>Stagger</> to the enemies hit.

content.cn:
<@ba.poise>失衡值</>满时，敌人进入<@ba.poise>失衡状态</>，持续一段时间。
期间敌人无法行动，受到的伤害增加。
<@ba.info>如果敌人在很短时间内就进入失衡状态，那么失衡状态结束后的一段时间内，对该敌人累积的失衡值会降低。</>
content.en: Once the <@ba.poise>Stagger meter</> is full, the enemy becomes <@ba.poise>Staggered</> for a while. A staggered enemy cannot move and take more DMG. <@ba.info>If an enemy is Staggered very quickly, that enemy's Stagger buildup will be reduced for a while after first Staggered status ends.</>

content.cn:
部分强大的敌人存在<@ba.poise>失衡节点</>。
在失衡值满之前，只要失衡值累积到<@ba.poise>失衡节点</>，也可以打断敌人行动并让敌人短暂踉跄。
content.en: Some powerful enemies have <@ba.poise>Stagger Nodes</> across their entire Stagger meter. When such enemies build up enough Stagger and reach a <@ba.poise>Stagger Node</>, their actions will also be interrupted and they will stumble for a while.

content.cn:
一些技能会对敌人叠加<@ba.pulse>电磁附着</>（最多4层）。
处于<@ba.pulseinflict>电磁附着</>状态的敌人再次被施加<@ba.pulseinflict>电磁附着</>时，会触发<#ba.pulseburst>电磁爆发</>。
处于其他<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>状态的敌人被施加<@ba.pulseinflict>电磁附着</>时，会触发<#ba.conduct>导电</>。
content.en:
Some skills can apply <@ba.pulse>Electric Infliction</> stacks (max: 4) to enemies. To an enemy with <@ba.pulseinflict>Electric Infliction</>, applying another <@ba.pulseinflict>Electric Infliction</> triggers an <#ba.pulseburst>Electric Burst</>.
To an enemy with a non-Electric <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</>, applying <@ba.pulseinflict>Electric Infliction</> triggers <#ba.conduct>Electrification</>.

content.cn: 处于<#ba.pulseinflict>电磁附着</>状态的敌人再次被施加<#ba.pulseinflict>电磁附着</>时，会叠加一层<#ba.pulseinflict>电磁附着</>（最多4层），并受到<@ba.pulse>电磁爆发</>：短暂延迟后受到<@ba.pulse>电磁伤害</>。
content.en: To an enemy with <#ba.pulseinflict>Electric Infliction</>, applying another <#ba.pulseinflict>Electric Infliction</> adds 1 more stack of <#ba.pulseinflict>Electric Infliction</> (max stacks: 4) and triggers <@ba.pulse>Electric Burst</>, which deals <@ba.pulse>Electric DMG</> after a short delay.

content.cn:
消耗技力后，满足一定条件时，重新获得的一部分技力。
返还技力并不算作“恢复技力”，不会触发恢复技力时触发的效果，且这部分技力消耗时不会获得终结技能量。
content.en: After spending SP and meeting certain criteria, some of the SP spent will be returned. SP Return is not "SP Recovery" and does not activate SP Recovery-triggered effects. Spending returned SP also does not give Ultimate Energy.

content.cn:
护盾可以在持续时间内<@ba.key>吸收伤害</>。
<@ba.info>部分护盾只会吸收特定类型的伤害。</>
content.en: The shield can <@ba.key>absorb DMG</> for a certain duration. <@ba.info>Some shields may only absorb specific types of DMG.</>

content.cn:
一定时间内目标的<@ba.key>移动速度降低</>（数值代表降低的幅度）。
<@ba.info>同类效果会取效果最高值。</>
content.en: Slowed targets temporarily <@ba.key>suffer movement speed reduction</>. The number represents the degree of reduction. <@ba.info>When there are multiple effects of the same type, only the most powerful applies.</>

content.cn:
<@ba.key>技力</>可以用于施放<@ba.key>战技</>。
技力会随时间自动恢复，主控干员的<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>命中也可以恢复技力。
content.en: <@ba.key>Skill Points (SP)</> are used for casting <@ba.key>battle skills</>. SP naturally regenerates over time. Hitting enemies with the controlled operator's <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> also recovers SP.

content.cn:
<@ba.key>技力</>可以用于施放<@ba.key>战技</>。
技力会随时间自动恢复，主控干员的<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>命中也可以恢复技力。
content.en: <@ba.key>Skill Points (SP)</> are used for casting <@ba.key>battle skills</>. SP naturally regenerates over time. Hitting enemies with the controlled operator's <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> also recovers SP.

content.cn:
<@ba.key>技力</>可以用于施放<@ba.key>战技</>。
技力会随时间自动恢复，主控干员的<#ba.lastcombo>重击</>命中也可以恢复技力。
content.en: <@ba.key>Skill Points (SP)</> are used for casting <@ba.key>battle skills</>. SP naturally regenerates over time. Hitting enemies with the controlled operator's <#ba.lastcombo>Final Strike</> also recovers SP.

content.cn:
异常等级等于触发<#ba.physicalstatus>物理异常</>或<#ba.spellstatus>法术异常</>时<#ba.consume>消耗</>的<#ba.noguard>破防</>或<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>层数（最高4级）。
<#ba.statuslevel>异常等级</>越高，<#ba.physicalstatus>物理异常</>和<#ba.spellstatus>法术异常</>的效果就越强。
content.en: Status Level is the number of <#ba.noguard>Vulnerability</> or <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Infliction</> stacks (max 4) <#ba.consume>consumed</> when triggering a <#ba.physicalstatus>Physical Status</> or <#ba.spellstatus>Arts Reaction</>. The higher the <#ba.statuslevel>Status Level</>, the stronger the resulting <#ba.physicalstatus>Physical Status</> or <#ba.spellstatus>Arts Reaction</>.

content.cn:
主控干员以外的干员，会自动进行普通攻击。
可以随时手动施放他们的战技、连携技和终结技。
content.en: Other operators not being controlled will automatically perform basic attacks. Their battle skills, combo skills, and ultimates can be manually cast whenever they are ready.

content.cn:
主控干员以外的干员，会自动进行普通攻击。
可以随时手动施放他们的战技、连携技和终结技。
content.en: Other operators not being controlled will automatically perform basic attacks. Their battle skills, combo skills, and ultimates can be manually cast whenever they are ready.

content.cn: 终结技能量充满时，<@ba.key>长按技能键</>，可以施放终结技，给敌人强力一击！
content.en: When Ultimate Energy is full, <@ba.key>long-press the battle skill key</> to cast the ultimate and unleash a powerful strike on the enemy!

content.cn: 终结技能量充满时，<@ba.key>按住<action=common_indicator_start>并长按<action=battle_use_char_skill_hint_2></>，可以施放终结技，给敌人强力一击！
content.en: When Ultimate Energy is full, <@ba.key>while holding down <action=common_indicator_start>, press and hold <action=battle_use_char_skill_hint_2></> to cast the ultimate and unleash a powerful strike on the enemy!

content.cn: 终结技能量充满时，<@ba.key>拖动或长按技能键</>，可以施放终结技，给敌人强力一击！
content.en: When Ultimate Energy is full, <@ba.key>tap and hold or drag the skill button</> to cast the ultimate and unleash a powerful strike on the enemy!

content.cn:
终结技能量有两种获得方式：
施放<@ba.key>战技</>时，<@ba.key>全队</>获得等量的终结技能量。
施放<@ba.key>连携技</>时，<@ba.key>施放者</>自身获得终结技能量。
content.en: There are 2 ways to gain Ultimate Energy: (1) Casting <@ba.key>battle skills</>, which grants <@ba.key>every teammate</> an equal amount of Ultimate Energy; (2) casting <@ba.key>combo skills</>, which only grants the <@ba.key>caster</> Ultimate Energy.

content.cn:
施放终结技需要消耗所有终结技能量，且施放后会进入短暂冷却时间。
部分干员的终结技会让自己进入强化状态，此期间不再能获得终结技能量。
content.en: Casting the ultimate will spend all Ultimate Energy and the ultimate will enter a short cooldown. Some operators' ultimates enhance themselves. While their ultimate enhancement is active, no Ultimate Energy will be gained as well.

content.cn:
一定时间内目标<@ba.key>受到的特定属性的伤害提高</>（数值代表提高的幅度）。
<@ba.info>同类效果可以叠加。</>
content.en: Susceptible targets temporarily <@ba.key>suffer more DMG of the element it is Susceptible to</>. The number represents the degree of increase. <@ba.info>Effects of the same type can stack.</>

content.cn:
一定时间内目标<@ba.key>造成的伤害降低</>（数值代表降低的幅度）。
<@ba.info>同类效果会以非线性方式叠加。</>
content.en:
Weakened targets temporarily <@ba.key>deal less DMG</>. The number represents the degree of reduction.
<@ba.info>Effects of the same type can stack non-linearly.</>

content.cn:
<@gd.key>集成工业系统</>是终末地工业掌握的关键核心技术之一。
借助<@gd.key>集成工业系统</>，能够搭建一套功能完整的自动化生产线，生产各种材料，以制造装备、战术物品、工业设备，及各类工业产物。
content.en:
The <@gd.key>Automated Industry Complex (AIC)</> is one of the key technologies of Endfield Industries.
Use the <@gd.key>AIC</> to create the fully automated AIC Factory and produce various materials for making pieces of gear, tactical items, AIC facilities, and other AIC products.

content.cn: 塔卫二分布着很多个<@gd.key>协议采录桩</>。靠近并交互后，即可获得<@gd.key>工业点数</>。
content.en: Many <@gd.key>Protocol Dataloggers</> can be found scattered across Talos-II. Approach and interact with them to acquire <@gd.key>AIC Index</>.

content.cn: <@gd.key>协议采录桩</>已经被标记在了地图中，可以通过地图标记来定位<@gd.key>协议采录桩</>。
content.en: The locations of <@gd.key>Protocol Dataloggers</> are already marked on the map. Use map markers to find these <@gd.key>Protocol Dataloggers</>.

content.cn:
每个地区设有独立的<@gd.key>协议容量</>上限。
在<@gd.key>集成核心区域外</>放置设备会消耗协议容量。
不同类型的设备，消耗的协议容量也会有所不同。
当某个地区的协议容量达到上限时，该地区将无法放置新的设备。
content.en: Every region has its own <@gd.key>Protocol Capacity</>. Different facilities take up different amounts of Protocol Capacity and placing them <@gd.key>outside the Core AIC Area</> uses up the Capacity. If Protocol Capacity of a region has been used up, no more facilities can be placed in that region.

content.cn: 铳械塔是一种作战设备，作战设备在正常运转过程中，会对攻击范围内的敌对目标进行自动攻击。
content.en: The Gun Tower is a combat facility. When operational, it automatically attacks enemy targets within its attack range.

content.cn:
在选择作战设备的放置位置时，将会出现表示其<@gd.key>攻击范围</>的蓝色指示圈。
作战设备会对<@gd.key>攻击范围内的敌对目标</>进行自动攻击。
content.en: When placing a combat facility, the blue circle indicates its <@gd.key>attack range</>. Combat facilities will automatically attack <@gd.key>enemy targets within their attack range</>.

title.cn: 作战设备 - 攻击范围

content.cn:
作战设备既受到<@gd.key>协议容量</>限制，也会受到<@gd.key>专属数量</>限制。
放置作战设备时，两种限制提示均会出现。
content.en: The number of combat facilities that can be placed is limited by <@gd.key>Protocol Capacity</> as well as a separate <@gd.key>Combat Facilities Limit</>. Both restrictions will be displayed when placing combat facilities.

title.cn: 作战设备 - 数量限制

content.cn:
作战设备发动攻击的前提为设备已通电且<@gd.key>当前充能满足攻击条件</>。
可通过设备外部或设备详情界面中的<@gd.key>充能环</>判断当前充能情况。
content.en: Combat facilities must be powered and have <@gd.key>enough charges</> to attack enemies. Combat facility charging status is visible from its appearance. The <@gd.key>charging ring</> shown in the facility panel also indicates its charging status.

content.cn:
当作战设备<@gd.key>接入电网</>后，会随时间逐渐获得充能，充能设有上限。
发动攻击需要消耗充能。<@gd.key>如果充能不满足消耗，则作战设备无法发动攻击</>。
content.en: Once <@gd.key>connected to the power grid</>, the combat facility will slowly charge itself. There is also a charge limit. A combat facility must consume charges to attack, and will be <@gd.key>unable to attack if it lacks the minimum charges required</>.

content.cn: <@gd.key>“毒沼”MK-Ⅰ</>在有能源供给的情况下会自动攻击附近范围内的敌人，造成范围伤害及减速效果。
content.en: A powered <@gd.key>Marsh Gas Mk I</> automatically attacks enemies within range to deal area DMG and slow them down.

content.cn: 传送带是一种基础物流设备，作用是在设备间运输各种材料，只限定在<@gd.key>集成核心区域</>中才可以建设传送带。
content.en: Transport belts are basic logistics units. They are used to move materials and products between facilities. Transport belts can only be placed in the <@gd.key>Core AIC Area</>.

content.cn: 在集成核心区域进入传送带模式后，可开始放置传送带。选择地面或任意拥有输出输入口设备的输出输入口，可以规划出传送带的方向和路线。
content.en: In the Core AIC Area, enter the transport belt mode to start placing transport belts. Select any grid on the ground, facility outputs, or facility inputs to determine the directions of the transport belt and plan its route.

content.cn: 放置传送带时，设备的输入口与取货口的物流方向会用明显的箭头标出。传送带的起点必须是设备或者已放置的传送带。
content.en: When placing transport belts, the input and output ports of facilities will be marked with conspicuous arrows. Any transport belt must start from a facility or another transport belt already placed.

content.cn:
工业设备界面上也可查看传送带的物流信息。
左侧表示设备的<@gd.key>输入口</>以及传送带自动<@gd.key>输入</>的材料情况。
右侧表示设备的<@gd.key>取货口</>以及传送带自动<@gd.key>输出</>的产物情况。
content.en: The control panel of transport belts shows their logistics info. The left side represents the facility's <@gd.key>input ports</> and auto-<@gd.key>loading</> of materials from incoming transport belts. The right side shows the facility's <@gd.key>output ports</> and auto-<@gd.key>unloading</> of products to outgoing transport belts.

content.cn: 当出现阻塞情况时，物品将停止输入设备或从设备输出，设备界面下方会出现阻塞警示。
content.en: When a facility is clogged, the facility will stop loading materials or unloading products. The bottom part of the facility panel will also display warning signs that the facility is clogged.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>模拟空间</>用于模拟集成工业系统的不同使用场景。
可在<@gd.key>行动手册</>或<@gd.key>工业发展规划</>中进入。
完成后，还可获得对应的<@gd.key>系统蓝图</>。
content.en: <@gd.key>Simulations</> are used to simulate different scenarios for using the AIC Factory. Once activated, the simulation can be directly accessed via the <@gd.key>Operational Manual</> or <@gd.key>AIC Factory Plan</>. Completing simulations also provides a relevant <@gd.key>system blueprint</>.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>蓝图</>是用于快速布置集成工业设备的工具。
使用<@gd.key>蓝图</>可以快速将成型的设备布局建造在集成核心区域内。
content.en: <@gd.key>Blueprints</> are special tools to quickly set up AIC Factory facilities. Use <@gd.key>blueprints</> to quickly deploy preset layouts of multiple facilities in the Core AIC Area.

content.cn:
在完成部分模拟空间后，可获得对应产线的<@gd.key>系统蓝图</>。
使用系统蓝图可帮助快速搭建产线。
content.en: Certain <@gd.key>system blueprints</> are rewards acquired by completing certain simulations. System blueprints can be used to quickly set up production lines.

content.cn:
好友间可以通过<@gd.key>好友沟通</>互相分享蓝图并保存。
也可以将蓝图生成<@gd.key>分享码</>，并通过输入蓝图分享码来导入蓝图。
content.en: Friends can use <@gd.key>Friend Chat</> to share blueprints with each other and save posted blueprints. Blueprint <@gd.key>sharing codes</> can also be created. Players can then enter the sharing codes to import the shared blueprint.

content.cn: 在放置蓝图时，如果当前拥有设备不足，允许先以<@gd.key>待建造组</>形式放置，后续提交欠缺设备<@gd.key>全部补足</>后，可一次性转化为<@gd.key>正式设备</>。
content.en: When placing blueprints without all of the facilities required, the missing facilities can be placed as an <@gd.key>Unconstructed Set</>. Submitting <@gd.key>all</> of the missing facilities converts the Unconstructed Set into <@gd.key>actual facilities</> with a single action.

content.cn:
可将背包或仓库中的物品拖入设备，<@gd.key>如果该设备存在对应配方</>，就会正常工作。
每台设备只能同时进行一种配方的生产。
content.en: Items can be dragged from the Backpack or Depot into a facility. If the facility has the <@gd.key>formula for processing the items</>, it will do so accordingly. Each facility can only use 1 production formula at any given time.

content.cn: 设备完成加工后，可以将产物收取回背包或仓库中。
content.en: Once facilities finish processing, the products can be retrieved and placed in the Backpack or Depot.

content.cn:
进行建设工作时，可选中背包仓库中的设备进行放置。
也可以将背包仓库中的设备拖入快捷栏，使用对应快捷键进入建造。
content.en: When setting up the AIC Factory, select facilities in the Backpack or Depot to place them. Facilities can also be dragged from the Backpack or Depot into the hotbar, then use the hotkeys to start placing them.

content.cn:
可以在设备列表中查找并快速放置已有的设备。
当设备列表中的设备数量不足时，如果在<@gd.key>集成核心区域</>，则可以直接进行设备制造。
content.en: Use the Facility List to quickly find and place facilities already owned. If more facilities are required, go to the <@gd.key>Core AIC Area</> to construct them.

content.cn:
集成工业系统的所有工业设备都由协议核心制造。
制造设备需要对应的<@gd.key>设备模板</>，可通过<@gd.key>工业发展规划</>研究工业技术获取。
content.en: All AIC Factory facilities are constructed by the Protocol Automation-Core (PAC). The <@gd.key>facility template</> is required for the construction. Templates can be acquired by researching AIC technologies in the <@gd.key>AIC Factory Plan</>.

content.cn: 可以在集成核心区域放置<@gd.key>仓库存取线基段</>。
content.en: <@gd.key>Depot Bus Sections</> can be placed in the Core AIC Area.

title.cn: 武陵仓库存取线 - 一

content.cn: <@gd.key>仓库存取线基段</>和<@gd.key>仓库存取线源桩</>或其他生效的仓库存取线基段相连后，其上可贴靠放置仓库存货口和仓库取货口。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Depot Bus Section</> must be connected to a <@gd.key>Depot Bus Port</> or other active Depot Bus Sections. Once active, Depot Loaders and Depot Unloaders can be attached to the Depot Bus.

title.cn: 武陵仓库存取线 - 二

content.cn:
榴弹塔通过供电或电池获得充能后，会自动攻击范围内的敌人。
榴弹命中敌人后会爆炸，造成<@gd.key>群体伤害</>。
content.en: When charged by the power grid or batteries, Grenade Towers can automatically attack enemies within range. The grenades they fire will explode upon hitting the enemy to deal <@gd.key>damage to a group of enemies</>.

content.cn:
高爆榴弹塔通过供电或电池获得充能后，会自动攻击范围内的敌人。
高爆榴弹塔比起榴弹塔拥有<@gd.key>更高的伤害</>。
content.en: When charged by the power grid or batteries, HE Grenade Towers can automatically attack enemies within range. The HE Grenade Tower deals <@gd.key>higher damage</> than the Grenade Tower.

content.cn:
在工业模式下，可进入<@gd.key>俯瞰模式</>。
在俯瞰模式下，干员会保持原位置不动，视角被固定为俯瞰视角。
能够更容易看清集成核心区域的全貌，方便进行复杂的产线建设。
content.en: AIC Mode also offers a <@gd.key>Top View Mode</>. In Top View Mode, the operators will remain at their places and the view is switched to a top view camera. This gives a clearer view of the Core AIC Area and is useful for setting up complex production lines.

content.cn:
在俯瞰模式下，可对复数个设备、物流设施进行批量框选操作。
在<@gd.key>批量框选</>状态中，可以对选中的设备进行<@gd.key>复制</>、<@gd.key>移动</>、<@gd.key>保存蓝图</>和<@gd.key>拆除</>等操作。
content.en: In Top View Mode, box selection can be used to select multiple facilities and logistics units. Facilities can also be <@gd.key>copied</>, <@gd.key>moved</>, <@gd.key>saved to a blueprint</>, and <@gd.key>stashed</> when using <@gd.key>box selection</>.

content.cn: 便捷存取站可以直接连接当地的仓库，快捷存取物品。
content.en: Easy Stashes can be directly connected to a local Depot to quickly load and unload various items.

content.cn: 接入电网的便捷存取站会出现在他人的游玩环境中，也许能帮助到他人。
content.en: Easy Stashes connected to the power grid will also appear in the scenes of other players. Their contents may help them greatly.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>配件机</>可以将含有配件标签的材料进行加工生产，产物可用于多种设备加工与成品构装。
典型产物为<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>，由<@gd.key>紫晶纤维</>放入<@gd.key>配件机</>后生产获得。
content.en:
The <@gd.key>Fitting Unit</> can process materials with the [Fit] tag to produce facility construction materials or other things.
Typical product: <@gd.key>Amethyst Part</>, made by placing <@gd.key>Amethyst Fiber</> in the <@gd.key>Fitting Unit</>.

content.cn: <@gd.key>物品准入口</>可限制传送带上允许通过的物品。
content.en: <@gd.key>Item Control Port</> can limit items allowed to pass through transport belts.

content.cn: 可通过<@gd.key>物品准入口</>限制通过物品的数量，并在蓝图中标记此段传送带运送的物品。
content.en: Use the <@gd.key>Item Control Port</> to limit the quantity of items passing through the belt. It can also be used in blueprints to mark the type of items to be used on a blueprint.

content.cn: <@gd.key>物流桥</>可以使得两条相交的传送带各自独立地运输物品而互不影响。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Belt Bridge</> allows a transport belt to go over another without disrupting the flow of items on both belts.

content.cn: <@gd.key>汇流器</>可以将多条传送带上的物品合并到一条传送带上，最多可支持三条传送带汇流。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Converger</> can converge product flows of 3 transport belts into a single belt.

content.cn:
打开设备的操作面板后，使用移动按键，可以重新摆放设备的位置。
并且可以旋转设备，调整端口方向。
传送带不可以移动。
content.en: To move a facility, open its control panel, then use the Move button to move it. Facilities can also be rotated to adjust the positions of the input and output ports. Transport belts cannot be moved in this manner.

content.cn: 打开设备的操作面板后，可以使用收纳按键，将设备收纳回背包或仓库。
content.en: After opening a facility's control panel, use the stash button to stash the facility and place it in the Backpack or Depot.

content.cn: 在完成工业技术的研究后，<@gd.key>供电桩</>也能够进行电力运输，从而更方便的完成供电设备之间的电路连接。
content.en: Research this AIC technology to give <@gd.key>Electric Pylons</> the ability to transmit power across distances. This is especially useful to establish power transmission connections between power facilities.

content.cn: 在高度不足、无法放置中继器的位置，可以尝试使用供电桩继续进行电力运输。
content.en: In certain cramped places where the Relay Tower cannot fit, the smaller Electric Pylon might be useful for power transmission.

content.cn: <@gd.key>拆解机</>可以对物品进行物理拆分，例如将装有液体的瓶子拆分为空瓶子与液体。
content.en: <@gd.key>Separating Units</> can physically separate certain items. An example would be separating a filled bottle into an empty bottle and its fluid content.

content.cn:
跨地区传输是指，在不同地区间，进行物品传输的功能。可在<@gd.key>协议核心 - 协议管理处</>使用。
跨地区传输有两种模式：<@gd.key>库存传输</>和<@gd.key>超库存传输</>，分别在传输起点地区<@gd.key>对应建设等级</>时解锁。
content.en: Regional transfer is a function that transfers items and goods from one region to another. It can be used at the <@gd.key>PAC - Protocol Management</>. There are 2 modes of Regional Transfer: <@gd.key>Stockpile Transfer</> and <@gd.key>Metastorage Transfer</>, respectively unlocked by reaching <@gd.key>specific Regional Development Levels</> in the source region.

content.cn: <@gd.key>库存传输</>指在传输起点地区的仓库中<@gd.key>扣除物品</>，<@gd.key>等量传输</>到终点地区。
content.en: <@gd.key>Stockpile Transfer</> <@gd.key>deducts goods</> from the source depot and transfers the <@gd.key>same amount of goods</> to the depot of the destination region.

content.cn: <@gd.key>超库存传输</>指<@gd.key>不扣除起点地区的仓储物品</>，终点地区可以<@gd.key>直接获得</>对应物品的传输方式，会在传输起点地区升到较高建设等级时解锁。
