content.en: <@gd.key>Metastorage Transfer</> is the <@gd.key>direct transfer</> of goods to the destination region <@gd.key>without deducting any goods from the source region storage</>. This mode of transfer is unlocked when the source region reaches a higher Regional Development Level.

content.cn: 给水器只能在湖泊或水池附近建造，且给水器的输水口必须悬于液面上方。
content.en: Fluid Supply Units can only be placed near a lake or other water bodies. When placed, its fluid outlet must be above the water body.

content.cn: 给水器接入电网后，可以将液体输出到对应的场景内。
content.en: The Fluid Supply Unit must be connected to the power grid to supply fluids to the specified area.

content.cn: 如果水体内已有液体与给水器输入液体类型不同，给水器将无法正常工作。
content.en: If the fluid to be supplied by the Fluid Supply Unit differs from the existing fluid in the target pool, the Fluid Supply Unit will be unable to work.

content.cn:
只有在工业模式下可以进行设备建造。
工业模式下，启用专用于设备的快捷栏，将设备拖入快捷栏后，使用对应快捷键即可放置设备。
content.en: The Automated Industry Complex (AIC) includes a special AIC Mode that must be used to construct AIC Factory facilities. The AIC Mode also features a special hotbar with hotkeys for placing facilities. Simply drag facilities into the hotbar to use it.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>灌装机</>可以将含有灌装标签的材料进行合成生产，可制造多种制剂或食品产品。
典型产物为<@gd.key>荞愈胶囊</>，由<@gd.key>紫晶质瓶</>和<@gd.key>荞花粉末</>放入<@gd.key>灌装机</>后合成获得。
content.en:
The <@gd.key>Filling Unit</> can process materials with the [Fill] tag to produce various medications or processed foods. 
Typical product: <@gd.key>Buck Capsule [C]</>, made by placing <@gd.key>Amethyst Bottle</> and <@gd.key>Buckflower Powder</> in the <@gd.key>Filling Unit</>.

content.cn:
生产设备可有多种生产配方。可以在设备操作面板查看该设备当前可生产的所有配方。 
只要放入的物品满足设备能够生产的任一配方，设备就会开始生产。
content.en: Production facilities have various production formulas. Open the facility's control panel to view all production formulas currently available to it. If items placed in the facility satisfy the inputs of any formula, the facility will use it to start production immediately.

content.cn:
液氮塔通过供电或电池获得充能后，会自动攻击范围内的敌人。
液氮晶体命中后会使敌人<@gd.key>减缓行动速度</>，但杀伤性较低。
content.en: When charged by the power grid or batteries, LN Towers can automatically attack enemies within range. LN crystals deal limited damage but they can <@gd.key>slow the movement</> of enemies hit.

content.cn:
工业设备可对不同原料进行加工，用以生产各类工业材料和成品。精炼炉对应<@gd.key>精炼</>这一加工方式。
典型产物为<@gd.key>晶体外壳</>，由<@gd.key>源矿</>放入<@gd.key>精炼炉</>后生产获得。
content.en:
AIC facilities can process different materials to produce various factory goods and products. Refining Units can <@gd.key>refine</>. 
Typical product: <@gd.key>Origocrust</>, made by placing <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> in the <@gd.key>Refining Unit</>.

content.cn:
粉碎机对应<@gd.key>粉碎</>这一加工方式。
典型产物为<@gd.key>源石粉末</>，由<@gd.key>源矿</>放入<@gd.key>粉碎机</>后生产获得。
content.en:
Shredding Units can <@gd.key>shred</> materials into powder. 
Typical product: <@gd.key>Originium Powder</>, made by placing <@gd.key>Originium Ore</> in the <@gd.key>Shredding Unit</>.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>协议核心</>是集成工业系统的中枢设备，承担了诸多功能，是进行工业建设的核心。
在协议核心所在的集成核心区域内，可以进行仓储管理。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Protocol Automation-Core</> (PAC) is the heart of the Automated Industry Complex (AIC) Factory. Storage management becomes available when standing in the Core AIC Area of the PAC.

content.cn: 终末地工业只能使用<@gd.key>协议核心</>供电，来构建当前地区唯一的电力网络。
content.en: Every Endfield power grid facility in the region must ultimately link back to the <@gd.key>PAC</>.

content.cn:
在集成核心区域内和协议传送点附近，仓库与背包是连通的。
可同时打开背包与仓库，进行仓储管理。
content.en: The Backpack is connected to the Depot in the Core AIC Area or near TP Points. Both the Backpack and Depot panels are opened at once for easy storage management.

content.cn:
大部分设备都需要使用<@gd.key>供电桩</>供电，才能开始工作。
只要将设备放置在<@gd.key>已接入电网的供电桩</>的供电范围内，即可完成供电。
content.en: Most facilities must be powered by <@gd.key>Electric Pylons</> to work. Power a facility by placing it within the power supply radius of an <@gd.key>Electric Pylon connected to the power grid</>.

title.cn: 供电桩与设备供电 - 一

content.cn: <@gd.key>供电桩</>只要放置在<@gd.key>协议核心</>的集成核心区域内，就会自动接入电网，为其供电范围内的设备供电。
content.en: Place <@gd.key>Electric Pylons</> in the Core AIC Area of the <@gd.key>PAC</> to automatically connect them to the grid. Connected Electric Pylons can supply power to facilities within their power supply radius.

title.cn: 供电桩与设备供电 - 二

content.cn:
在武陵地区，可切换至<@gd.key>武陵工业计划</>，发展新的工业技术。
在武陵，仍然可以收集<@gd.key>协议采录桩</>进行武陵工业点数的获取。
content.en: In the region of Wuling, switch to the <@gd.key>Wuling AIC Plan</> to research new AIC technologies. <@gd.key>Protocol Dataloggers</> can also be collected in Wuling to earn Wuling AIC Index.

content.cn:
射线塔通过供电或电池获得充能后，会自动攻击范围内的敌人。
射线塔对<@gd.key>单个敌人</>杀伤性大，但攻击间隔较长。
content.en: When charged by the power grid or batteries, Beam Towers can automatically attack enemies within range. Beam Towers deal high damage against <@gd.key>a single enemy</> but have a slow rate of fire.

content.cn:
电涌塔通过供电或电池获得充能后，会自动攻击范围内的敌人。
电流命中敌人后会进行两次<@gd.key>弹射</>，对目标附近的敌人也造成伤害。
content.en: When charged by the power grid or batteries, Surge Towers can automatically attack enemies within range. After hitting an enemy, the arc surge can <@gd.key>chain</> up to 2 times to deal damage to nearby enemies.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>灌装机</>解锁液体模式后，可进行与液体相关的不同配方生产。
典型产物为<@gd.key>装有芽针溶液的蓝铁瓶</>，由<@gd.key>芽针溶液</>和<@gd.key>蓝铁瓶</>放入<@gd.key>灌装机</>合成获得。
content.en:
After unlocking Fluid Mode for the <@gd.key>Filling Unit</>, the facility can produce with fluid-related formulas. 
Typical product: <@gd.key>Yazhen Solution in Ferrium Bottles</>, made by placing <@gd.key>Yazhen Solution</> and <@gd.key>Ferrium Bottle</> in the <@gd.key>Filling Unit</>.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>种植机</>解锁液体模式后，可产出依赖液体的新植物成株,。
典型产物为<@gd.key>锦草</>，将<@gd.key>清水</>和<@gd.key>锦草种子</>放入<@gd.key>种植机</>合成获得。
content.en:
After unlocking Fluid Mode for the <@gd.key>Planting Unit</>, the facility can grow crops that require fluids. 
Typical product: <@gd.key>Jincao</>, made by placing <@gd.key>Clean Water</> and <@gd.key>Jincao Seed</> in the <@gd.key>Planting Unit</>.

content.cn: 储液罐可储存管道输入的<@gd.key>单一类型液体</>。
content.en: A Fluid Tank can store <@gd.key>a single type of fluid</> delivered to it via pipelines.

content.cn: 管道分流器可将单一管道<@gd.key>分流出最多三条管道</>进行传输。
content.en: Pipe Splitters can <@gd.key>split 1 pipeline into 2 or 3 pipelines</> to divide fluid flow.

content.cn: <@gd.key>管道汇流器</>可以使得多条管道上的液体汇流到单一管道上，最多支持三条管道汇流。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Pipe Converger</> can converge up to 3 pipelines into a single pipeline.

content.cn: <@gd.key>管道桥</>可以使得两条相交的管道各自独立的运输液体而互不影响。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Pipe Bridge</> allows a pipeline to go over another without disrupting the flow of fluids in both pipelines.

content.cn: 在<@gd.key>设备制造与放置</>界面中选择<@gd.key>管道物流设备</>，直接进行放置或拖入快捷栏使用。
content.en: Use the <@gd.key>Facility List</> panel to select and place a <@gd.key>pipeline logistics unit</> directly, or drag it into the hotbar and place it with hotkeys.

content.cn: 武陵地区属于和四号谷地不同的全新地区，这里拥有独立的武陵仓库，只能对本地仓库中的物品进行管理。
content.en: Wuling is a region (like Valley IV) and has its own Wuling Depot. When exploring a region, you can only access its local depot.

content.cn: 解锁了多个仓库后，在帝江号上可以手动切换当前连接的地区仓库进行管理。
content.en: After unlocking multiple depots, go to Dijiang to manually switch the currently connected regional depot to manage it accordingly.

content.cn: 在探索进行到一定阶段后，会出现他人留下的<@gd.key>留言信标</>。
content.en: After reaching certain phases of exploration, <@gd.key>Memo Beacons</> left by other explorers may start to appear.

content.cn: <@gd.key>留言信标</>会留下一些图标和文字内容，记录了他人在这里想传达的信息。
content.en: <@gd.key>Memo Beacons</> may include icons and messages that other explorers wish to convey about the location.

content.cn: 医疗塔通过供电或电池获得充能后，可将充能转换为治疗量，为范围内当前编队干员回复<@gd.key>生命值</>。
content.en: When charged by the power grid or batteries, Medical Towers can convert their charges into treatment for restoring the <@gd.key>HP</> of team operators nearby.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>便携源石矿机</>可以使用采集的源石能源自行运作。
<@gd.key>不需要接入电网</>即可持续采集源矿。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Portable Originium Rig</> mines Originium Ore and uses a fraction of it to power itself. It does <@gd.key>not need to be connected to the power grid</> to keep mining Originium Ore.

content.cn:
请记得定期返回便携源石矿机处，手动收取已采集的源矿。
当源矿的采集数量达到矿机的储存上限时，<@gd.key>便携源石矿机</>将停止采集工作。
content.en: Remember to return to Portable Originium Rigs regularly to manually gather the mined Originium Ore. The <@gd.key>Portable Originium Rig</> will stop mining when its Originium Ore storage cache is full.

title.cn: 手动收取便携源石矿机
title.en: Portable Originium Rig: Manual Ore Collection

content.cn:
<@gd.key>电驱矿机</>能采集更高级的矿物，不过需要通电才能工作。
可使用<@gd.key>供电桩</>为其供电。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rig</> can mine higher tier minerals but must be powered in order to work. Use the <@gd.key>Electric Pylon</> to supply it with power.

content.cn: <@gd.key>电驱矿机</>拥有无线传输模式，可以将缓存区的矿物自动传输回仓库。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rig</> has belt-free transfer features that automatically deliver mined ores from its cache to the Depot.

title.cn: 电驱矿机 - 无线传输模式

content.cn: <@gd.key>二型电驱矿机</>是一种改良后的电驱矿机，可以开采更坚硬的蓝铁矿。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Electric Mining Rig Mk II</> is an improved version of the Electric Mining Rig. It is capable of mining harder minerals such as Ferrium Ore.

content.cn: 矿机是用来开采矿物的设备，只能放置在矿点上。
content.en: Mining Rigs are facilities specialized for mining ores. They can only be placed on mining spots.

content.cn:
不同矿机能够开采的矿物种类也不同。
低级矿机无法开采高级矿物。
content.en: Different mining rigs can mine different minerals. Lower tier mining rigs are incapable of mining higher tier minerals.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>反应池</>可将材料进行<@gd.key>反应</>或将固体溶解在液体中。
典型产物为<@gd.key>锦草溶液</>。由<@gd.key>清水</>和<@gd.key>锦草粉末</>放入<@gd.key>反应池</>后合成获得。
content.en:
The <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible</> can perform <@gd.key>reactions</> or dissolve solids to make solutions. 
Typical product: <@gd.key>Jincao Solution</>, made by placing <@gd.key>Clean Water</> and <@gd.key>Jincao Powder</> in the <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible</>.

content.cn: 在使用<@gd.key>反应池</>时，需要手动配置产出物品的出口，液体和固体会从配置的对应出口流出
content.en: When using the <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible</>, the product outlets must be manually set to move fluid and solid materials out of the facility.

content.cn: 可以通过<@gd.key>反应池</>的指示颜色判断液体会从哪个管道流出。
content.en: Use the <@gd.key>Reactor Crucible's</> indicator colors to differentiate between the fluid outlet pipelines.

content.cn: 扩增反应缓存后，单一反应池同一时间可<@gd.key>进行更多配方反应</>。
content.en: Expanding the cache of the Reactor Crucible lets it perform <@gd.key>more reaction formulas</> at once.

content.cn:
通过<@gd.key>配方固定</>功能将配方固定在主界面，在工厂区域内即可在主界面查看已固定的配方。
选择固定的配方中的道具，可以查看道具详情和进行<@gd.key>配方跳转</>，跳转后通过返回按钮可以返回跳转前的配方。
content.en: <@gd.key>Pin formulas</> to show them at the main screen in the Core AIC Area. Select the items of the pinned formula to view details of the item and open its own <@gd.key>formula</>. After opening the formula, use the Back button to return to the original pinned formula.

content.cn: 可参考地面的输入箭头与输出箭头，进行管道的连接。
content.en: Refer to the input and output arrows on the ground to make pipeline connections.

content.cn: 管道的单次放置有最大长度的限制。完成管道放置后，管道末端会自动生成一个管道支架，可从管道支架处继续延长放置下一个管道。
content.en: There is a length limit when placing pipelines. When a pipeline is placed, a pipe support is also auto-placed at the very end. The next pipeline section can begin from that pipe support.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>种植机</>可以种植非稀有植物的种子，产出对应的植物成株。
典型产物为<@gd.key>荞花</>，由<@gd.key>荞花种子</>放入<@gd.key>种植机</>后生产获得。
content.en:
The <@gd.key>Planting Unit</> can grow seeds of common plants and raise them to maturity. 
Typical product: <@gd.key>Buckflower</>, grown from <@gd.key>Buckflower Seeds</> placed in the <@gd.key>Planting Unit</>.

content.cn: 在完成工业技术的研究后，<@gd.key>中继器</>现在也能够进行小范围供电，在野外能够更方便地为设备提供电力。
content.en: Research this AIC technology to give <@gd.key>Relay Towers</> the ability to supply power to nearby facilities. This is especially useful for powering facilities in the wilderness.

content.cn:
协议核心、次级核心与大部分生产设备都具有输入口与取货口。
将传送带从取货口连出，即可从取货口输出货物；
将传送带连入输入口，即可将货物输入设备或仓库。
content.en: The PAC, Sub-PAC, and most production facilities have input and output ports. Connect transport belts to the output port to automatically move items out of the facility or Depot. Connect transport belts to the input port to move items into the facility or Depot.

content.cn: <@gd.key>协议核心、次级核心</>和<@gd.key>仓库</>是相连的，在取货口选定物品后，这个取货口将试图向外运输仓库中的选定物品。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Protocol Automation-Core (PAC) and Sub-PAC</> are connected to the <@gd.key>Depot</>. Once an item is selected for an output port, it will start to unload the selected item from the Depot into the Core AIC Area.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>中继器</>是运输电力的重要连接设备。
电力可通过中继器运输至其他的中继器、供电桩以及供电终端，使其接入电网。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Relay Tower</> is a key power transmission facility. Relay Towers can be used to transmit power to other Relay Towers, Electric Pylons, and Electric Nexuses to connect them to the power grid.

title.cn: 中继器与电力运输 - 一

content.cn: 协议核心是电力的来源。只有从协议核心运输电力至<@gd.key>中继器</>后，该中继器和与其连接的设备才能接入电网。
content.en: The Protocol Automation-Core (PAC) is the origin and source of the power grid. Transmit power from the PAC to a <@gd.key>Relay Tower</> to add it and all connected facilities into the power grid.

title.cn: 中继器与电力运输 - 二

content.cn:
在集成核心区域外，中继器<@gd.key>无法为设备直接供电</>，需要通过供电桩来为设备供电。
从<@gd.key>已通电的中继器</>传输电力至供电桩，使其接入电网，此时供电桩可为其范围内的设备供电。
content.en: Relay Towers outside the Core AIC Area <@gd.key>do not supply power to facilities</>. This can only be done with a powered Electric Pylon. Transmit power from a <@gd.key>powered Relay Tower</> to an Electric Pylon to connect the latter into the power grid. The Electric Pylon can then power facilities within its power supply radius.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>热能池</>是用于生产电能的设备，可提高当前区域的发电功率，从而支持更多设备同时工作。
所需要消耗的原材料是<#item.originium>源矿</>和<@gd.key>电池</>。
使用<@gd.key>电池</>的发电效率高于源矿，可大幅提高发电效率。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Thermal Bank</> is a facility that generates electrical power. It raises the power output of the regional power grid to supply power to more facilities. Thermal Banks consume <#item.originium>Originium Ore</> and <@gd.key>batteries</> to generate power. <@gd.key>Batteries</> generate more power than Originium Ore and greatly improve power output efficiency of Thermal Banks.

content.cn: 水泵只能在湖泊等水体附近建造，且水泵的抽水口必须插入水体中。
content.en: The Fluid Pump must be placed near lakes or other water bodies. The pump inlet must be within the water body itself.

content.cn: 用供电桩为水泵供电后，可进行稳定的液体获取。
content.en: Use Electric Pylons to power the Fluid Pump and acquire fluids at a stable rate.

content.cn: '每个集成核心区域都可以进行升级，靠近区域附近的<@gd.key>集成管家</>，可以进入升级界面。
content.en: Every Core AIC Area can be upgraded. Approach the <@gd.key>AIC Steward</> near the Core AIC Area to open the upgrade screen.

content.cn: 可以消耗地区的<@gd.key>调度券</>来升级集成核心区域，升级后区域面积将会扩大，还会有其他功能随着探索进度而解锁。
content.en: Regional <@gd.key>stock bills</> can be spent to upgrade the Core AIC Area. An upgraded Core AIC Area will be bigger. Exploration progress will also make other functions available.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>采种机</>可对非稀有植物进行采种，产出相应的植物种子。
典型产物为<@gd.key>荞花种子</>，由<@gd.key>荞花</>放入<@gd.key>采种机</>后生产获得。
content.en:
The <@gd.key>Seed-Picking Unit</> can pick seeds from common plants. 
Typical product: <@gd.key>Buckflower Seed</>, picked from <@gd.key>Buckflowers</> placed in the <@gd.key>Seed-Picking Unit</>.

content.cn:
部分无法快速种植的稀有作物也可通过<@gd.key>采种机</>进行采种。
典型产物为<@gd.key>灰芦麦种子</>，将<@gd.key>灰芦麦</>放入<@gd.key>采种机</>生产获得。
content.en:
<@gd.key>Seed-Picking Units</> can be used to pick seeds from rare plants that cannot be grown quickly. 
Typical product: <@gd.key>Reed Rye Seed</>, picked from <@gd.key>Reed Rye</> placed in the <@gd.key>Seed-Picking Unit</>.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>塑形机</>可以将含有塑形标签的材料进行加工生产，产物可用于多种制剂和食品生产。
典型产物为<@gd.key>紫晶质瓶</>，由<@gd.key>紫晶纤维</>放入<@gd.key>塑形机</>后生产获得。
content.en:
The <@gd.key>Moulding Unit</> can process materials with the [Mould] tag to make materials for making medication and food production. 
Typical product: <@gd.key>Amethyst Bottle</>, made by placing <@gd.key>Amethyst Fiber</> in the <@gd.key>Moulding Unit</>.

content.cn:
在探索进行到一定阶段后，塔卫二中会出现来自他人的共享设备。
可便捷地使用这些设备。
content.en: After reaching a certain Exploration Level, facilities shared by other players will start to appear in Talos-II. They can be used as required.

content.cn:
共享设备的稳定度会随时间降低，稳定度归零后即会消失。
维护共享设备可以提升其稳定度，延长存在时间。
content.en: A shared facility loses stability with time and will completely disappear at zero stability. Repair shared facilities to reset its stability and extend its presence.

content.cn:
可以在共享设备的来源详情处添加其他玩家为好友。
好友间还可以分享共享设备。
content.en: View the source details of a shared facility to add the sharing player as a friend. Friends can also share shared facilities.

content.cn: 塔卫二中存在一些由终末地工业为验证协议技术投送的实验设备，可作为共享设备使用，但无法添加好友。
content.en: There are a number of experimental facilities in Talos-II used by Endfield Industries to verify Techno-Protocol deployment. They can be treated as shared facilities, but offer no source players to add as a friend.

content.cn:
全向声波塔通过供电或电池获得充能后，会自动攻击范围内的敌人。
全向声波不造成伤害，命中后会使敌人<@gd.key>眩晕</>。
content.en: When charged by the power grid or batteries, the Omnidirectional Sonic Tower can automatically attack enemies within the area. The tower emits non-damaging sonic waves that <@gd.key>stun</> enemies they hit.

content.cn:
哨戒塔通过供电或电池获得充能后，会自动攻击范围内的敌人。
哨戒塔面对多名敌人时，会<@gd.key>优先攻击威胁更高的目标</>。
哨戒塔的攻击范围较大。
content.en: When charged by the power grid or batteries, Sentry Towers can automatically attack enemies within range. When facing multiple enemies, Sentry Towers will <@gd.key>first attack higher threat targets</>. They also have a long attack range.

content.cn: <@gd.key>分流器</>可以将一条传送带上的物品平均分拣到多条传送带上，最多可支持分流成三条传送带。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Splitter</> can split the product flow of 1 transport belt to up to 3 transport belts.

content.cn: 可在设备列表中选中<@gd.key>分流器</>，直接进行放置或拖入快捷栏来使用。
content.en: Select the <@gd.key>Splitter</> from the Facility List to place it, OR drag it into the facilities hotbar then use hotkeys to place it instead.

content.cn: <@gd.key>洒水机</>在接入水源后可为需要浇灌的目标进行液体喷洒；
content.en: Connect the <@gd.key>Sprinkler</> to a source of water to sprinkle water to the target.

content.cn: 如果对应目标没有浇灌需求<@gd.key>洒水机</>会智能停止喷洒。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Sprinkler</> is smart and will automatically stop sprinkling the target if it no longer needs watering.

content.cn: <@gd.key>协议储存箱</>可存放物品，并在通电后可以将储存物品以一定间隔传输回仓库
content.en: The <@gd.key>Protocol Stash</> can store items. When powered, the Protocol Stash can also deliver stored items to the Depot on a regular basis.

content.cn: <@gd.key>协议储存箱</>也可以通过连接<@gd.key>传送带</>来运输储存的物品
content.en: The <@gd.key>Protocol Stash</> can also be connected to <@gd.key>transport belts</> to move its stored contents out.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>次级核心</>拥有与<#fac.hub>协议核心</>类似的功能：
不仅可作为协议传送点，也可为在其集成核心区域内的<@gd.key>供电桩</>自动供电。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Sub-PAC</> and <#fac.hub>PAC</> share similar functions. Both can be used as TP Points and automatically supply power to <@gd.key>Electric Pylons</> within their Core AIC Areas.

content.cn: <@gd.key>工业发展规划</>详细地展示了工业技术的发展路线。每个节点代表一项工业技术。
content.en: The <@gd.key>AIC Factory Plan</> shows a detailed AIC Factory technology research tree. Every node represents an AIC technology.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>工业发展规划</>共分为三期计划。
只有推进主线任务获得拓展核心后，才可开启下一期计划。
content.en: The <@gd.key>AIC Factory Plan</> is divided into 3 phases. Progress through the main mission and acquire Expansion Cores to unlock the next phase.

content.cn: 可以在<@gd.key>工业发展规划</>查看工业技术的<@gd.key>相关教学</>。
content.en: Use the <@gd.key>AIC Factory Plan</> to view <@gd.key>tutorials</> on various AIC technologies.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>研磨机</>可以将含有研磨标签的材料进行合成生产，制造出更细密的材料粉末，同时需要研磨辅材。
典型产物为<@gd.key>致密蓝铁粉末</>，由<@gd.key>蓝铁粉末</>和<@gd.key>砂叶粉末</>放入<@gd.key>研磨机</>后合成获得。
content.en:
The <@gd.key>Grinding Unit</> can process materials with the [Grind] tag to make dense and finer powders with the help of grinding auxiliaries. 
Typical product: <@gd.key>Dense Ferrium Powder</>, made by placing <@gd.key>Ferrium Powder</> and <@gd.key>Sandleaf Powder</> in the <@gd.key>Grinding Unit</>.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>封装机</>可以将含有封装标签的材料进行合成生产，可制造爆炸物或电池产品。
典型产物为<@gd.key>低容电池</>，由<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>和<@gd.key>源石粉末</>放入<@gd.key>封装机</>后合成获得。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Packaging Unit</> can process materials with the [Package] tag to make explosives or batteries. Typical product 1: <@gd.key>LC Battery</>, made by placing <@gd.key>Amethyst Part</> and <@gd.key>Originium Powder</> in the <@gd.key>Packaging Unit</>.

content.cn: 典型产物之二为<@gd.key>工业爆炸物</>，将<@gd.key>紫晶零件</>和<@gd.key>酮化灌木粉末</>放入<@gd.key>封装机</>合成获得。
content.en: Typical product 2: <@gd.key>Industrial Explosive</>, made by placing <@gd.key>Amethyst Part</> and <@gd.key>Aketine Powder</> in the <@gd.key>Packaging Unit</>.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>长距滑索架</>是一种改良后的滑索架。
长距滑索架不仅可以增加传输距离，而且可支持一次性通过多个<@gd.key>长距滑索架</>。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Zipline Tower</> is an improved version of the Zipline Pylon. It has a longer zipline range and allows the creation of zipline routes that pass through multiple <@gd.key>Zipline Towers</> in a single trip.

content.cn:
在<@gd.key>长距滑索架</>上，可以指定另一个可到达的<@gd.key>长距滑索架</>作为下一个“连接点”。
每个<@gd.key>长距滑索架</>只可指定一个连接点。
连续多次指定连接点后，即可组成一条单向的中途不停止移动的<@gd.key>连接路径</>。
content.en: After latching onto a <@gd.key>Zipline Tower</>, another <@gd.key>Zipline Tower</> within zipping range can be selected as the next "node". Any <@gd.key>Zipline Tower</> can only be selected as the "node" once. Do this a few times to create a <@gd.key>linked one-way route</> and zip from the first to the last Zipline Tower without stopping.

content.cn: 若在已指定的连接路径上移动，每次将经过<@gd.key>长距滑索架</>前都会出现向下一个连接点移动的<@gd.key>按键提示</>，若在限制时间内完成按键操作，可自动前往已指定的下一个<@gd.key>连接点</>。
content.en: When ziplining along a linked route and approaching a <@gd.key>Zipline Tower</>, a <@gd.key>button prompt</> indicating the next node to move to will appear on screen. Press the button within the time limit to continue ziplining to the next <@gd.key>node</> in the link without stopping.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>滑索架</>用于在两地之间快速移动，靠近即可使用。
可以选择其他滑索架作为目标，只要路线中<@gd.key>没有障碍物</>即可滑行到目的地。
content.en: Set up zipline routes with <@gd.key>Zipline Pylons</> to quickly zip from one Pylon to another. Approach a Zipline Pylon to latch on to it to start ziplining. Other Zipline Pylons can be selected as the destination to quickly zip to it, as long as there are <@gd.key>no obstacles</> along the way.

content.cn: 因为<@gd.key>滑索架</>的运营需要极高的维护成本，因此每个地区可放置的滑索架数量极为有限，需要细心规划。
content.en: Only a limited number of <@gd.key>zipline facilities</> can be placed in an area due to their expensive maintenance. Hence, zipline routes must be planned carefully.

content.cn:
扩装铳械塔通过供电或电池获得充能后，会自动攻击范围内的敌人。
扩装铳械塔比起铳械塔拥有<@gd.key>更高的伤害</>。
content.en: When charged by the power grid or batteries, Heavy Gun Towers can automatically attack enemies within range. The Heavy Gun Tower deals <@gd.key>higher damage</> than the Gun Tower.

content.cn: 仓库存取线可通过<@gd.key>仓库存货口</>与<@gd.key>仓库取货口</>实现物品在仓库中的自由存取。
content.en: The Depot Bus uses <@gd.key>Depot Loaders</> and <@gd.key>Depot Unloaders</> to move items into and out of the Depot respectively.

content.cn:
可使用<@gd.key>仓库取货口</>选择仓库中的物品，连接传送带后，就会从仓库中自动输出。
将物品通过传送带输入进<@gd.key>仓库存货口</>后，物品就会存放进仓库。
content.en: Interact with a <@gd.key>Depot Unloader</> to select a Depot item, then connect the Depot Unloader to a transport belt to automatically unload the selected item from the Depot. Moving items to a <@gd.key>Depot Loader</> via a connected transport belt will automatically store them in the Depot.

content.cn: <@gd.key>仓库存货口</>和<@gd.key>仓库取货口</>可贴靠仓库存取线进行自由摆放。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Depot Loader</> and <@gd.key>Depot Unloader</> can be placed anywhere right next to the entire length of the Depot Bus.

title.cn: 仓库存货口和取货口的位置

content.cn:
<@gd.key>装备原件机</>可以将含有装备标签的材料进行合成生产，产物可用于装备制造。
典型产物为<@gd.key>紫晶装备原件</>，由<@gd.key>晶体外壳</>和<@gd.key>紫晶纤维</>放入<@gd.key>装备原件机</>后合成获得。
content.en:
The <@gd.key>Gearing Unit</> can process materials with the [Gear] tag to produce materials for gear assembly. 
Typical product: <@gd.key>Amethyst Component</>, made by placing <@gd.key>Origocrust</> and <@gd.key>Amethyst Fiber</> in the <@gd.key>Gearing Unit</>.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>装备原件</>是制作装备的必要材料。
装备品质不同，所需要的<@gd.key>装备原件</>也有所不同。
content.en: Gear <@gd.key>components</> are essential for gear assembly. Different <@gd.key>components</> are needed to assemble gear of different quality.

content.cn: 息壤供电桩是武陵地区特有的设备。在集成核心区域外可<@gd.key>自动连接</>协议核心与息壤中继器（80m内）、息壤供电桩以及其他电力设备（30m内），但无法连接核心区域内的其他电力设备。在集成核心区域内仅会自动连接协议核心。可进行范围供电与短距离电力传输。
content.en: Xiranite Pylons are exclusive to the region of Wuling. When placed outside the Core AIC Area, they <@gd.key>auto-connect</> to the PAC and Xiranite Relays within an 80-meter radius; and to Xiranite Pylons and other power facilities within a 30-meter radius. However, they cannot connect to other power facilities within the Core AIC Area. When placed inside the Core AIC Area, they only auto-connect to the PAC. Xiranite Pylons can be used for powering facilities within range and power transmission across short distances.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>天有洪炉</>可用于制造<@gd.key>息壤</>这一产物。
息壤可用于制造武陵特色的设备、装备等，也可在探索中提供重要帮助。
天有洪炉是武陵地区特殊的设备，只能在武陵地区放置。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Forge of the Sky</> produces <@gd.key>Xiranite</>. This material is needed to construct special facilities, assemble special gear of Wuling, and can be helpful during exploration. Forges of the Sky are special facilities of Wuling and can only be placed in that region.

content.cn: 天有洪炉具有放置数量的限制，可通过研究后续的工业技术，来增加能够放置的数量上限。
content.en: Only a limited number of Forges of the Sky can be placed. Research certain AIC technologies to place more Forges.

title.en: Forge of the Sky: Placement Limit

content.cn: 息壤中继器是武陵地区特有的设备。在集成核心区域外可<@gd.key>自动连接</>协议核心与全部息壤电力设备（80m内），但无法连接核心区域内的其他电力设备。在集成核心区域内仅会自动连接协议核心。可进行电力传输与小范围供电。
content.en: Xiranite Relays are exclusive to the region of Wuling. When placed outside the Core AIC Area, they <@gd.key>auto-connect</> to the PAC and any Xiranite power facilities within an 80-meter radius, but cannot connect to other power facilities within the Core AIC Area. When placed inside the Core AIC Area, they only auto-connect to the PAC. Xiranite Relays can be used for power transmission and powering facilities within a short range.

content.cn:
工业模式下，可进入收纳模式。
收纳模式下，可快速收纳周围选中的设备，非常便捷。
content.en: The AIC Mode also includes the Stash Mode. Stash Mode allows quick and easy stashing of nearby facilities that have been selected.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>光荣之路</>中收纳了塔卫二蚀刻章的各种信息。
可以自由编辑展示已获得的蚀刻章，并查看保存的蚀刻章展示状态。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Path of Glory</> has information on various engraved medals that can be earned in Talos-II. Use this feature to view, edit, and save the engraved medal showcase.

content.cn: 编辑好的蚀刻章会在个人名片与帝江号蚀刻章展示墙处展示，请继续探索、获得更多蚀刻章。
content.en: Once edited and saved, the medal showcase will be displayed at the personal Profile and medal display wall aboard Dijiang. Keep exploring to earn more engraved medals.

content.cn: <@gd.key>行动手册</>系统中集成了行动节点、日常任务、战术训练等功能，可帮助您更快熟悉塔卫二的各项事务。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Operational Manual</> is a system that integrates various features, such as Activity Nodes, Daily Tasks, and Tactical Training. Use it to get familiar with various activities on Talos-II.

content.cn:
推进<@gd.key>主线任务</>达到一定阶段后，往往需要达到更高的权限等阶。
随着权限等阶的提升，可以获得各种奖励，如<@gd.key>装备蓝图</>和<@gd.key>理智上限提升</>。
content.en: Higher Authority Level may be required to progress through certain stages of the <@gd.key>main mission</>. Reaching higher Authority Levels also gives rewards that include <@gd.key>gear templates</> and <@gd.key>higher max Sanity</>.

content.cn:
完成任务、冒险探索、探索协议空间、放置矿机等各项行动都能为管理员积累<@gd.key>行动资历</>。
每当<@gd.key>行动资历</>积累到一定程度，管理员的<@gd.key>权限等阶</>都会得到提升。
content.en: The Endministrator can earn <@gd.key>Operational EXP</> via various activities, such as completing missions and Protocol Spaces, exploring the world, and placing mining rigs. Having enough <@gd.key>Operational EXP</> raises the Endministrator's <@gd.key>Authority Level</>.

content.cn: 可以在协议同步器中打开等阶晋升，查看后续权限等阶的奖励。
content.en: Open the Protocol Synchronizer (Protosync menu) to open the Authority Level screen and see rewards at various Authority Levels.

content.cn:
每位干员都具备力量、敏捷、智识、意志四种能力值。
四种能力会为干员提供<@gd.key>不同属性加成</>。
content.en: Every operator has 4 attributes: Strength (STR), Agility (AGI), Intellect (INT), and Will (WILL). These attributes give operators <@gd.key>different attribute bonuses</>.

content.cn:
不同干员都有其擅长的<@gd.key>主能力</>和<@gd.key>副能力</>。
主能力提升时，会为干员额外提供<@gd.key>大量攻击力加成</>；副能力则会提供少量攻击力加成。
content.en: Every operator has a <@gd.key>main attribute</> and a <@gd.key>secondary attribute</>. Increasing the main attribute gives the operator a <@gd.key>large bonus to Attack</>, while increasing the secondary attribute gives a smaller bonus to Attack.

content.cn:
在塔卫二采集到的物品，以及通过<@gd.key>集成工业系统</>生产的物品，会存放在背包与仓库中。
当背包装满物品后，无法将新的物品放入背包。可在<@gd.key>协议传送点</>或<@gd.key>集成核心区域</>进行仓储管理，将多余的物品存放至仓库。
content.en: Items gathered from Talos-II or produced by the <@gd.key>AIC Factory</> are either stored at the Backpack or Depot. Items cannot be placed in a full Backpack, but the storage management feature can be used at any <@gd.key>TP Point</> or <@gd.key>Core AIC Area</> to store unneeded items in the Depot.

content.cn:
在干员详情页面中，可以培养干员各个方面的能力，进而帮助更好地应对各种复杂情况。
可以通过消耗干员经验培养素材，增加干员的经验，提升干员的等级，从而提升干员的<@gd.key>能力值与生命值</>。
达到等级上限后，则需要进行<@gd.key>阶段进阶</>，才能继续提升等级。
content.en: The operator Overview screen is used for operator progression to improve their performance in various scenarios. Spend operator EXP materials to level up operators and improve their <@gd.key>attributes and HP</>. When operators reach a level cap, they must be <@gd.key>promoted</> to raise the level cap for continued leveling.

content.cn:
终末地的目标是建设发展塔卫二的各个地区，可通过<@gd.key>地区建设系统</>来实现。
居民的<@gd.key>据点建设</>就是重要的一环。
content.en: The objective of Endfield is to develop various regions of Talos-II. The <@gd.key>Regional Development System</> is a way to realize this endeavor. The <@gd.key>Outpost Development Project</> for the residents in various areas will play an important role.

content.cn: 探索地区、向地区据点供货及其他各种方式都将获得<@gd.key>地区建设值</>，累计地区建设值提升<@gd.key>地区建设等级</>。
content.en: There are multiple ways to earn <@gd.key>Regional Development Metrics (RDM)</>, including exploration and supplying goods to regional outposts. Earning enough RDM will raise the <@gd.key>Regional Development Level</>.

content.cn:
随<@gd.key>地区建设等级</>提升，将开放各种功能，提升世界中的矿物产率，增加各区域中可放置的工业设备等。
地区建设等级提升到最高意味着地区已被高度开发，以此为目标建设地区吧。
content.en: Raising <@gd.key>Regional Development Level</> (RDL) makes various functions available. It also increases mineral ore yields and AIC Factory facility placement limits in various areas. Only the most well-developed regions can reach the highest RDL. This is also a goal we should aim for.

content.cn: 通过解锁与升级<@gd.key>仓储节点</>，可增加对应地区的仓库库存上限。
content.en: Unlock and upgrade <@gd.key>depot nodes</> to increase the storage capacity of regional depots.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>装箱运送</>需要使用指定类型的物品进行装箱。
通过升级<@gd.key>仓储节点</>可解锁新的可运输类型、容量更大的包裹。
content.en: <@gd.key>Pack and Deliver</> requires the packing of special types of items. Upgrade the <@gd.key>depot node</> to unlock more types of deliverables and packages with larger capacities.

content.cn: <@gd.key>装箱运送</>的目标是：在<@gd.key>取货点</>取得货物，再运输至目标<@gd.key>送货点</>。
content.en: The goal of <@gd.key>Pack and Deliver</> is to get the goods from a <@gd.key>Pick-Up Point</> then deliver them to the <@gd.key>Delivery Point</>.

content.cn:
在运送过程中，需要避免影响<@gd.key>货物完整度</>的因素。
可使用<@gd.key>滑索架</>来实现高效且安全的装箱运送。
content.en: A good delivery will always try to keep the <@gd.key>goods intact</>. Try using <@gd.key>zipline facilities</> to Pack and Deliver faster and safer.

content.cn: 可通过接取他人委托的运送任务来赚取调度券，每日有接取上限。
content.en: Accept and complete Pack and Deliver missions to earn stock bills. There is a daily limit to the number of missions that can be accepted.

content.cn:
货物装箱并接取运送委托后，可在<@gd.key>任务</>系统中，将该送货任务委托给他人派送。
其他玩家可在<@gd.key>运送委托列表</>中接取并完成该委托。
content.en: After accepting a delivery job in the Pack Goods feature, go to the <@gd.key>Mission</> screen to transfer the job to other players. Other players can then use the <@gd.key>List of Delivery Jobs</> to accept these jobs.

content.cn:
将委托转交出去后，若被其他玩家完成，则双方均可获得等额的调度券尾款。
若时限内未被完成，仍可获得一半的调度券尾款。
content.en: Once a transferred job is completed by another player, both the transferrer and the one performing the job will receive a final fee of the same amount. Even if the job cannot be completed within the time limit, both parties will still receive half of the stock bills in the final fee.

title.cn: 转交运送委托的奖励结算

content.cn:
在物资调度中，可使用<@gd.key>谷地调度券</>以较多的折扣购买商品。
可通过将其他的物资调度员纳入系统、或升级现有物资调度员，解锁更多商品的购买权限。
content.en: In Stock Redistribution, use <@gd.key>Valley Stock Bills</> to purchase items at higher discounts. Adding more Stock Redistributors into the system or upgrading existing Stock Redistributors also unlocks more item purchasing privileges.

content.cn: 弹性需求物资的价格会每天发生波动。可在价格较低时买入，在价格较高时出售以获取利润。
content.en: The prices of elastic goods fluctuate on a daily basis. Buy low and sell high to earn profits.

content.cn:
好友飞船上的弹性需求物资价格与当地价格存在差异。
可<@gd.key>前往拜访好友的飞船</>，进行弹性需求物资的出售以获取利润。
content.en: Prices of elastic goods aboard a friend's ship may differ from local prices. <@gd.key>Visit a friend's ship</> then sell your stock of elastic goods to earn a profit.

content.cn:
在装备页面中，可以为干员穿戴与更换各个部件的装备。
每位干员都可穿戴一件护甲、一件护手、两件配件总共四件装备。
不同部位的装备相互配合能够激活<@gd.key>套组效果</>。
content.en: Use the Gear screen to equip operators with various gear. Every operator can equip 4 pieces of gear: 1 suit of armor, 1 pair of gloves, and 2 kits. Equipping multiple pieces of gear from the same set also activates <@gd.key>set effects</>.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>装备精锻</>可通过消耗材料来提升<@gd.key>金色品质装备</>的属性。
可对金色品质装备的各初始属性进行精锻，成功后将<@gd.key>固定提升属性数值</>，每项属性都有可精锻次数的上限。
content.en: <@gd.key>Gear Artificing</> consumes materials to improve the stats of <@gd.key>gold quality gear</>. Various base stats of gold quality gear can be artificed, and every successful artificing provides a <@gd.key>fixed increase to the stats</>. Every stat has an artificing limit.

content.cn: 每次进行精锻操作，需消耗一件与待精锻装备<@gd.key>相同部位</>的金色品质装备，以及一个与待精锻装备所属地区相同的<@gd.key>精锻助剂</>。
content.en: Every artificing attempt costs 1 piece of gold quality gear of the <@gd.key>same equipping part</>, and 1 <@gd.key>artificing catalyst</> of the same region as the piece of gear to be artificed.

content.cn: 作为精锻耗费的装备需<@gd.key>含有待精锻属性</>，且该属性未强化前的初始值不小于待精锻装备对应属性初始值。
content.en: The gear to be spent for artificing must have <@gd.key>artifice-able stats</>. The base value of such stats must be at least as high as the base value of the matching stats of the gear to be artificed.

content.cn:
每次对装备属性进行精锻时，将积累精锻进度，积累达到上限时，下一次该装备属性精锻强化将<@gd.key>必定成功</>。
不同装备和属性的精锻积累上限略有不同。
content.en: Performing gear artificing of a particular gear stat builds up artificing progress. Reaching the progress limit <@gd.key>guarantees success</> for the next artificing attempt of this gear stat. Different gear and gear stats have different artificing progress limits.

content.cn:
装备精锻有较小可能直接强化成功，且清空当前精锻积累。
耗费装备的属性初始值<@gd.key>高于</>待精锻装备初始值时，直接完成精锻强化的可能性略有<@gd.key>提升</>。
content.en: Gear artificing attempts have a small chance of direct success. A successful attempt also resets the current artificing progress. Chance of direct success is slightly <@gd.key>improved</> when the gear used as the artificing material has <@gd.key>higher</> base stats than those of the gear to be artificed.

content.cn: 可使用集成工业系统制造装备，能够提高使用者的作战能力。
content.en: The AIC Factory can be used to assemble gear that can improve the wearer's combat capabilities.

content.cn:
获取<@gd.key>装备制造模板</>后，即可制造对应的装备。
装备制造模板可通过提升<@gd.key>权限等阶</>获取，部分需要通过世界探索发现。
content.en: Acquire <@gd.key>gear template</> to assemble the specified gear. Some gear templates can be acquired by gaining <@gd.key>Authority Levels</>. Others can be found by exploring the world.

content.cn:
制造装备需要调度券与装备原件。
<@gd.key>谷地调度券</>可通过击败敌人、完成据点等玩法获取。
<@gd.key>装备原件</>可以通过<@gd.key>装备原件机</>制造。
装备原件机需在工业发展规划中完成对应工业技术的研究，并在集成核心区域内完成建造。
content.en: Gear assembly requires stock bills and gear components. <@gd.key>Valley Stock Bills</> can be earned by defeating enemies or performing Regional Development and Outpost activities. <@gd.key>Gear components</> can be produced using the AIC Factory facility: <@gd.key>Gearing Unit</>. Unlock this facility by researching specific AIC technologies in the AIC Factory Plan. The Gearing Unit must then be constructed and placed in the Core AIC Area.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>好友</>系统中集成了个人名片、好友列表、添加好友等功能。
可管理目前好友、查看好友信息、发起与好友的聊天、以及进行个性化展示。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Friends</> feature includes these functions: profile, friends list, and add friends. Use this feature to manage current friends, view friend details, chat with friends, and personalize the profile displayed to other players.

content.cn:
在<@gd.key>个人名片</>中，可查看管理员的各项信息，如任务进度、干员与武器持有数量、光荣之路等。
并可用于对其他玩家显示，可在<@gd.key>个人名片</>中更换展示的干员，并进行个性化设置，如更改名片主题、头像、头像框等。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Profile</> displays various information of the Endministrator, including mission progress, number of operators and weapons acquired, and Path of Glory (achievement medals). The <@gd.key>Profile</> is also displayed to other players and provides a number of personalization options: operators showcased, profile themes, portraits, and portrait frames.

content.cn:
可通过消耗不需要的基质，强化现有的基质。
每次需要消耗一个无瑕基质，对另一个无瑕基质的一个附加技能进行蚀刻。
content.en: Essences can be enhanced by consuming other unwanted essences. Etching 1 stat of a flawless essence costs 1 flawless essence.

content.cn:
如果蚀刻成功，则基质的附加技能等级会获得提升；
如果蚀刻失败，则会产生一定数量的<@gd.key>冷却脂</>。
content.en: Successful etching levels up the essence stats. Failed etching attempts produce a number of <@gd.key>Coolant Gel</>.

content.cn: 可使用一定数量的<@gd.key>冷却脂</>，进行<@gd.key>必定成功</>的基质蚀刻。
content.en: Use enough <@gd.key>Coolant Gel</> to <@gd.key>guarantee the success</> of essence etching.

content.cn: 可在<@gd.key>重度能量淤积点</>中，通过<@gd.key>消耗理智</>的方式，获取金色基质。
content.en: Challenge <@gd.key>Severe Energy Alluvium</> and <@gd.key>spend Sanity</> to acquire gold quality essences.

content.cn:
可在背包中进行简易制作，将原材料制作为有用的物品。
例如可通过简易制作，将<@gd.key>荞花</>制作成能够回复生命值的<@gd.key>荞花粉末</>。
content.en: Open the Backpack panel to access the Crafting screen. Various raw materials can be crafted into useful items. For example, <@gd.key>Buckflower</> can be crafted into <@gd.key>Buckflower Powder</> for restoring HP.

content.cn:
<@gd.key>简制手册</>会记录采集过的各种物品的数量。
根据不同资源的累计采集数量进度，可以在简制手册中领取不同的奖励，包括新的<@gd.key>简制配方</>和<@gd.key>产物升级</>。
content.en: When gathering an item, the <@gd.key>Crafting Manual</> will make an entry of it and keep track of the total amount gathered so far. Collect enough of the item to claim various Crafting Manual rewards that include new <@gd.key>crafting formulas</> and <@gd.key>product upgrades</>.

content.cn: 部分田块只能在<@gd.key>武陵地区</>种植，比如<@gd.key>金石稻田块</>。
content.en: Some planting plots can only be grown in <@gd.key>Wuling</>. An example will be the <@gd.key>Amber Rice Plot</>.

content.cn: 部分田块需要进行<@gd.key>多次浇水</>，利用<@gd.key>洒水机</>可实现自动化浇水。
content.en: Some plots require <@gd.key>multiple rounds of watering</> to make the plant grow. Use <@gd.key>Sprinklers</> to automate the watering step.

content.cn:
可在地图中查看当前区域的地形与各项信息。
并且可以选取地图上的各种标记物来查看具体内容，如<@gd.key>协议传送点</>、任务追踪点等。
选中<@gd.key>协议传送点</>后，可以直接传送至此处。
content.en: The Map screen gives geographical and other forms of data. Various markers can be selected for more details. These markers include <@gd.key>TP Points</> and mission tracking points. <@gd.key>TP Points</> on the map can also be directly selected to teleport to them directly.

content.cn:
可从地图或协议同步器进入地区总览。
在地区总览中，可查看当前地区的所有区域，并切换至不同的区域地图。
content.en: Region Overview can be accessed via the Map screen or the Protosync. It shows all the areas of the current region and allows switching to the map of any area selected.

content.cn:
可以在<@gd.key>简易制作</>的<@gd.key>种植调配</>类别中制造各种田块。
获得<@gd.key>植物</>后，自动解锁其<@gd.key>田块</>的制作工艺。
content.en: Use the <@gd.key>Planting</> section of <@gd.key>Crafting</> to craft plots that can be used for planting crops. Acquiring a <@gd.key>plant</> also unlocks the crafting formula for the <@gd.key>plot</> to grow that plant.

content.cn:
拥有田块后，将其放置在特定区域，进行种植。
种植有育苗、浇水、成长、收获四个阶段。
完成后可以收获对应的植物。
content.en: After acquiring a planting plot, it can be placed in special areas for planting. Planting has 4 stages: (1) Germinating, (2) Watering, (3) Growing, and (4) Harvesting. A fully grown plant can be harvested.

content.cn:
可使用干员信物，提升干员潜能阶段，获得更多加成。
重复招募干员时，可获取该干员的<@gd.key>潜能信物</>。
content.en: Use an operator's tokens to raise the said operator's potential and activate more bonuses. Acquire the operator's <@gd.key>potential token</> by recruiting the same operator again.

content.cn:
解锁干员的潜能阶段01、03、05时，能够获取<@gd.key>干员留影</>，并在帝江号上自定义展示。
部分干员的留影会在名片处展示。
content.en: Reaching an operator's Potential 01, Potential 03, and Potential 05 also unlocks the <@gd.key>operator's snapshot</>. These snapshots can be displayed aboard Dijiang. Some operator snapshots can also be displayed at the Profile panel.

content.cn:
情报档案库是由终末地情报办公室S.O.W.维护的信息系统。
在塔卫二收集到的各类信息，会上传至<@gd.key>见闻辑录</>。
其中待分析的重要情报，会整理至<@gd.key>情报采集</>。
<@gd.key>中枢档案</>归档了终末地的部分官方档案。
content.en: The Intel Archive is a data system maintained by the Endfield Intel Office SOW. Information gathered throughout Talos-II is uploaded to the <@gd.key>Findings</> section. Key intel to be analyzed will be sorted out at the <@gd.key>Intel Gathering</> section. The <@gd.key>Nexus Files</> is a collection of certain official documents and files of Endfield Industries.

content.cn:
塔卫二上的许多信息有着千丝万缕的关联。
可在<@gd.key>情报采集</>中，收集各个事件相关的线索。
当某个事件的所有线索收集完毕后，可进行事件调查结果的<@gd.key>提交</>，获得详细调查报告。
content.en: Pieces of intel found on Talos-II may be linked with each other. <@gd.key>Intel Gathering</> aims to sort and organize incident-related intel. Once every piece of intel of a particular incident has been gathered, the incident investigation outcomes can be <@gd.key>submitted</> to acquire a detailed Investigation Report (IR).

content.cn:
与据点建立联系后，即可开启据点供货
据点会随时间生产<@gd.key>谷地调度券</>，可以通过交易据点需要的货物获取据点存量的凭证
content.en: Establishing contact with an outpost activates the Outpost Supplies feature. Outposts generate <@gd.key>Valley Stock Bills</> over time. These stock bills can be earned by trading goods needed by the outposts.

content.cn: 使用<@gd.key>谷地调度券</>，可在四号谷地的<@gd.key>物资调度</>处购买各种珍贵的货品。
content.en: <@gd.key>Valley Stock Bills</> can be spent at Valley IV <@gd.key>Stock Redistribution</> sites to purchase various valuable goods.

content.cn: 当获得足量<@gd.key>据点发展值</>后，可进一步提升<@gd.key>据点发展阶段</>，进而会丰富据点需要的货品，交易后获得更多的据点报酬。
content.en: Earning enough <@gd.key>Outpost Prosperity</> raises the <@gd.key>Outpost Prosperity Level</>. A prosperous outpost will need more and better goods, but a successful trade will also provide better payments from the outpost.

content.cn:
在环境监测终端中，可以通过接取并完成<@gd.key>监测委托</>，获得报酬。
每个<@gd.key>监测委托</>都需要拍摄特定的图像进行记录。
content.en: Environment Monitoring Terminals provide <@gd.key>monitoring jobs</>. Complete them to earn rewards. Every <@gd.key>monitoring job</> involves the photographing of special targets.

content.cn:
武陵地区的环境监测终端，需要解锁后才能使用。
环境监测终端可以通过花费<@gd.key>调度券</>进行升级。
content.en: Environment Monitoring Terminals in Wuling must be unlocked before they can be used. The terminals can be upgraded by spending <@gd.key>stock bills</>.

title.cn: 环境监测终端的解锁与升级
title.en: Environment Monitoring Terminal: Unlock and Upgrade

content.cn:
看到光点时，进行交互即可进入拍照模式。
进入拍照模式后，当相机中出现<@gd.key>拍摄目标</>时拍下照片，即可完成委托。
content.en: When a glowing light is found, interact with it to enter Camera Mode, then take a photo when the <@gd.key>photography target</> enters the view of the camera to complete the monitoring job.

content.cn:
总控中枢承担着帝江号的管理职能。
在总控中枢的<@gd.key>中控台</>可以查看帝江号的整体信息，并进行所有舱室的进驻管理。
提升总控中枢的等级后，能够解锁帝江号更多的功能舱室。
content.en: The Control Nexus is the management center of Dijiang. Use the <@gd.key>Central Dashboard</> in the Control Nexus to view information of the entire ship and manage operator assignments of various cabins. Level up the Control Nexus to unlock more functional cabins aboard the ship.

content.cn: 通过会客室情报区的线索板或总控中枢可打开会客室线索收集界面。
content.en: Use the Reception Room Intel Section clue board or Control Nexus to open the Reception Room clue collection screen.

content.cn: 将干员进驻在会客室中即可随时间收集线索并获取信用奖励，集齐所有类型线索可开展情报交流。
content.en: Operators assigned to the Reception Room will collect clues and earn credits as time passes. Collect clues of every type to initiate Clue Exchange.

content.cn: 赠予和接收好友线索，前往好友飞船参与情报交流，还可获得更多信用奖励。
content.en: Clues can be sent to friends, or received from them. Visit a friend's ship to take part in Clue Exchange to earn more credits.

content.cn: 想要快速找到某位干员，可在中央环厅的<@gd.key>干员联络台</>处将其直接召集到身边。
content.en: To find an operator quickly, use the <@gd.key>Operator Contact Panel</> at the Central Ring to contact and summon them to the Endministrator's side.

title.cn: 帝江号 - 干员联络台

content.cn:
拜访好友飞船对其舱室进行<@gd.key>生产助力</>可获取信用。
还可通过线索收集、情报交流以及帮好友完成运送委托等更多方式获得信用。
content.en: Earn credits by visiting a friend's ship and giving <@gd.key>Production Assists</> to their cabins. Credits can also be earned via clue collection, clue exchange, and helping friends complete delivery jobs.

content.cn:
旅途中收集到的各类<@gd.key>陈列品</>可以放置在行迹高塔中进行展示。
陈列品没有实际的加成效果，标签只影响不同爱好的干员在查看此陈列品时可能的差异表现。
content.en: Various <@gd.key>display items</> may be collected during exploration. These can be showcased at the Tower of Trails. Display items offer no tangible bonuses. Their tags would only affect operator reactions when operators of different hobbies look at the display items.

content.cn: 前往帝江号<@gd.key>静滞核心</>，触摸协议奇点，可以切换管理员的身份。
content.en: Go to the <@gd.key>Stasis Core</> aboard Dijiang and touch the Protocol Singularity to switch the Endministrator's identity.

content.cn: <@gd.key>培养舱</>可以生产干员突破、技能提升、武器进阶等培养素材。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Growth Chamber</> can be used to grow progression materials for operator promotions, skill upgrades, and weapon tuning.

content.cn:
在培养舱进行培养还需用到一种特殊材料——<@gd.key>基核</>。
<@gd.key>基核</>可以从原有材料中提取获得，但同时也会消耗掉原有材料。
content.en: Growing materials at the Growth Chamber also requires special <@gd.key>seed</> materials. <@gd.key>Seed</> materials can be extracted from existing materials but this also consumes them.

title.cn: 帝江号 - 培养舱提取基核

content.cn: <@gd.key>制造舱</>可以随时间生产干员培养素材。
content.en: The <@gd.key>Manufacturing Cabin</> can produce operator progression materials when given enough time.

content.cn:
在<@gd.key>制造舱</>选定制造方案和数量后，进驻干员就会开始制造工作。
注意单次可设定的最大数量与制造舱的总<@gd.key>制造载荷</>，以及当前方案每个物品的占用载荷有关。
升级舱室后，可以解锁更多制造方案。
content.en: After selecting a manufacturing plan (MFG Plan) and the amount of items to make, the operator(s) assigned to the <@gd.key>Manufacturing Cabin </> will start working. NOTE: Manufacturing Cabins have a <@gd.key>MFG Load</> and different items use up different amounts of MFG Load. Level up the Manufacturing Cabin to unlock more MFG Plans.

title.cn: 帝江号 - 制造舱制造方案

content.cn:
功能舱室<@gd.key>至少要进驻1名干员才能正常运转</>。
进驻的每个干员都可以提升舱室的<@gd.key>生产效能</>。
content.en: <@gd.key>At least 1 operator</> must be assigned to a functional cabin to make it work. Every operator assigned can raise the <@gd.key>productivity</> of the cabin.

content.cn:
进驻在功能舱室的干员会随时间消耗<@gd.key>心情</>。
当心情<@gd.key>耗尽</>后干员会自行前往中央环厅进行<@gd.key>休息</>，且期间将无法提供进驻效果。
在干员心情<@gd.key>回满</>后也会<@gd.key>自动返回舱室进行工作</>。
content.en: The <@gd.key>mood</> of operators assigned to functional cabins will slowly decrease with time. An operator with <@gd.key>ZERO</> mood will automatically head to the Central Ring to <@gd.key>rest</>, and will not provide any assignment effects during resting. At <@gd.key>MAX</> mood, the operator will <@gd.key>automatically return to the assigned functional cabin and resume working</>.

title.cn: 帝江号 - 干员状态变化

content.cn: 收集到的成就奖章、干员履历和武器可放置在会客室中进行展示，供来访的好友参观。
content.en: All achievement medals, operator CVs, and weapons can be showcased at the Display Section of the Reception Room. They can be viewed by visiting friends.

title.cn: 帝江号 - 会客室展示区

content.cn: 在访客终端可查看最近来访的好友信息及其参与的活动。
content.en: Use the Guest Terminal to view records of friends who visited recently and the activities they took part in.

title.cn: 帝江号 - 会客室访客终端

content.cn: 可通过传送台前往好友飞船进行参观、助力、交流等活动，并获得信用奖励。
content.en: Use the TP Platform to visit a friend's ship and engage in various activities such as production assists and clue exchanges, and acquire credits by doing so.

content.cn: 提升干员信赖度，可以解锁更多天赋阵列和档案内容，同时会提升干员与管理员在帝江号上的互动效果。
content.en: Build the operators' trust to unlock Ability Matrix skills and reveal more profile data. Operators with higher trust also interact with the Endministrator differently aboard Dijiang.

title.cn: 帝江号 - 干员信赖度

content.cn:
与正在帝江号上活动的干员互动，可以与干员对话或送礼给干员。
赠送礼物可以提升干员对管理员的<@gd.key>信赖度</>，赠送干员喜爱的礼物能提升更多信赖度。
可以在帝江号的供应链专员处，通过协议交换获得礼物。
content.en: Interact with operators aboard Dijiang to talk to them or offer them gifts. Gifts will build the operators' <@gd.key>trust</> towards the Endministrator, especially when the gifts are things they really like. Talk to the Supply Chain Specialist aboard Dijiang and use the Protocol Exchange to get more gifts.

content.cn:
进驻总控中枢和功能舱室的干员会随时间持续提升与管理员之间的<@gd.key>信赖度</>。
管理员不在帝江号时，<@gd.key>信赖度</>也会持续累积，并在下次返回帝江号时获取。
content.en: Operators assigned to the Control Nexus or functional cabins will gradually build up <@gd.key>trust</> with the Endministrator. Operators will accumulate <@gd.key>trust</> continuously, even if the Endministrator is not aboard Dijiang. Accumulated trust will be added when the Endministrator visits Dijiang again.

title.cn: 帝江号 - 进驻累积信赖度

content.cn: 随着总控中枢等级的提升，帝江号中的预留区会逐步开放，为建造舱室提供更多可用的空间。
content.en: Leveling up the Control Nexus also gradually opens up the under maintenance area aboard Dijiang. This frees up more space for constructing more cabins.

content.cn: 预留区中会有更多可用的<@gd.key>待建舱室</>，拥有足够的航天材料后前往舱门位置即可进行建造。
content.en: The under maintenance area includes spaces for <@gd.key>unconstructed cabins</>. When there are enough Aerospace Materials, interact with the cabin door and initiate construction.

content.cn: 总控中枢等级升级后可提升特定舱室的等级上限，升级这些舱室可提升<@gd.key>进驻干员数量</>并解锁更多<@gd.key>生产内容</>。
content.en: Upgrading the Control Nexus also makes some cabin upgrades available. An upgraded cabin can have more <@gd.key>operators assigned</> and more <@gd.key>production options</> unlocked.

content.cn: 升级舱室所需的航天建材可在各地的<@gd.key>资源回收站</>中定期收取获得。
content.en: Cabin upgrades require Aerospace Materials. These can be regularly gathered from <@gd.key>Recycling Stations</> scattered throughout Talos-II.

content.cn: 在好友飞船上可参观查看对方展示的成就蚀刻章、干员履历、武器以及陈列品等内容。
content.en: A visitor to a ship can see the engraved medals, operator CVs, weapons, and other display items that the host has decided to showcase.

content.cn: 使用好友飞船上的物资调度终端，可查看对方的弹性需求物资价格并以该价格出售自身的库存货品。
content.en: Use the Stock Redistribution Terminal aboard a friend's ship to check their prices of elastic goods and sell stockpiled goods at their prices.

title.cn: 帝江号 - 物资调度终端

content.cn: 在访客终端界面中查看好友的舱室情况并进行生产助力、情报交流等活动可获得信用奖励。
content.en: The Guest Terminal screen shows the statuses of various cabins aboard a friend's ship. Use it to engage in Production Assist, Clue Exchange, and other social activities to earn credit rewards.

title.cn: 帝江号 - 好友访客终端

content.cn:
战术物品可以为战斗带来增益效果，可以在装备页面为每名干员装备一种战术物品。
每种战术物品都有<@gd.key>不同的生效条件</>及<@gd.key>使用次数上限</>。
content.en: Tacticals are items that can be used during combat to provide various benefits and buffs. Equip tacticals on the Gear screen. Each operator can be equipped with 1 tactical. Every tactical has <@gd.key>different activation criteria</> and <@gd.key>usage limits</>.

content.cn:
装备战术物品之后，干员会在战斗中符合生效条件的情况下，<@gd.key>自动使用物品</>。
战术物品的使用次数在单次战斗中耗尽后，会在一段时间后<@gd.key>恢复一次使用次数</>。
content.en: Once equipped, tacticals are <@gd.key>automatically used</> by the operator when the criteria are met during battle. After expending all tactical usage attempts in a single battle, <@gd.key>one more use will be restored</> after a while.

content.cn: 可在干员的<@gd.key>天赋阵列</>中查看干员所有的战斗技能、能力与天赋、精英化进程。
content.en: Go to the <@gd.key>Ability Matrix</> screen to view the operator's complete suite of battle skills, abilities, talents, and promotion progress.

content.cn:
在战斗技能区域，可以对干员的各个技能进行升级，增强干员各项战斗能力。
在能力与天赋区域，可以激活干员的各种<@gd.key>技能节点</>，增强干员各方面的能力。
content.en: Use the Combat section to upgrade the operator's combat skills and improve the operator's combat performance. Use the Talents Node section to activate various talent <@gd.key>nodes</> to improve the operator's performance in other areas.

title.cn: 干员技能的升级与激活

content.cn:
达到对应等级后，干员需要进行<@gd.key>精英化</>，才能够继续提升等级上限。
<@gd.key>精英化</>之后，也可以提升战斗技能等级，激活更多的<@gd.key>技能节点</>。
content.en: Operators who reach their level cap must be <@gd.key>promoted</> to keep leveling. <@gd.key>Promotion</> also upgrades the operator's battle skills and activates more <@gd.key>skill nodes</>.

content.cn:
在编队界面中，可以查看并调整当前探索小队的编队情况。
请合理安排干员编队，以此应对不同的挑战。
content.en: Use the Team screen to view and adjust the lineup of the exploration team. Try to deploy operators who can better deal with various challenges.

content.cn: 部分据点中会设立预警终端，每当<@gd.key>据点等级提升</>后，预警终端将提示新的入侵威胁。
content.en: Some outposts will have an Early Warning Terminal. Whenever the <@gd.key>outpost levels up</>, the Early Warning Terminal will detect and indicate new threats of incursions.

title.cn: 区域防护 - 预警终端

content.cn:
预警终端在据点中已经显示出敌人的入侵路线。
敌人会以此路线行动，破坏终点的指挥核心。
content.en: The Early Warning Terminal has indicated the enemy's route of invasion. Enemies will travel along this route to attack and destroy the Command Core of the outpost.

title.cn: 区域防护 - 入侵路线

content.cn:
我方将在据点内部署<@gd.key>指挥核心</>，地图上用<@gd.key>蓝色方形</>表示。
指挥核心可以协助据点防御作战并辅助作战设备高效运行，而敌人会试图破坏它。
一旦防守作战开始，指挥核心将投入运行，必须保护指挥核心不被敌人摧毁。
content.en: Our forces will place one or more <@gd.key>Command Cores</> in the outpost and they will be shown as <@gd.key>blue shields</> on the map. Command Cores are activated once the defense battle begins to support outpost defense and improve the performance of combat facilities. Defend the Command Core from being destroyed by the enemy.

title.cn: 区域防护 - 指挥核心

content.cn: 当入侵威胁存在时，完成干员介入作战，据点将进入<@gd.key>短期安全</>，居民积累调度券的效率会获得临时加成。
content.en: When there is a threat of incursion, completing an Operator Intervention battle will make the outpost <@gd.key>Partially Secure</> and give the residents a temporary boost to stock bills earning efficiency.

content.cn: 完成同一风险度的自动防御作战，居民积累调度券的效率将会<@gd.key>永久增加</>。完成更高风险度的作战将会获得更高的加成。
content.en: Completing an Area Defense battle in Auto-Defense mode for any risk level <@gd.key>permanently increases</> the residents' stock bills earning efficiency. Completing higher risk level battles in Auto-Defense mode gives even better bonuses.

content.cn:
获得<@gd.key>可使用物品</>后，可以在背包中选中该物品并使用。
使用后通常可以带来<@gd.key>回复或增益</>的效果，能够帮助管理员更好地应对复杂环境。
content.en: Open the Backpack to select and use any <@gd.key>usable items</> acquired. Item usage effects usually include <@gd.key>HP restoration or buffs</> that can improve the Endministrator's survivability in various environments.

content.cn:
武器、基质、装备和其他珍贵物品会存储于贵重品库中。
贵重品库与背包、仓库不会共通，享有单独的存储空间。
content.en: Weapons, essences, pieces of gear, and other valuables will be stored in the Valuables Stash. The Valuables Stash has its own set of storage space not shared with the Backpack or Depot.

content.cn:
协议同步器上集成了探索中会用到的各项功能。
点击正中间的区域后，即可打开地区总览。
content.en: The Protocol Synchronizer (Protosync) has integrated various functions useful for exploration. Click on the area shown in the middle to open Region Overview.

content.cn:
协议同步器上集成了探索中会用到的各项功能。
按下<action=watch_open_map>即可打开地区总览。
content.en: The Protocol Synchronizer (Protosync) has integrated various functions useful for exploration. Press <action=watch_open_map> to open Region Overview.

content.cn:
协议同步器上集成了探索中会用到的各项功能。
点击正中间的区域后，即可打开地区总览。
content.en: The Protocol Synchronizer (Protosync) has integrated various functions useful for exploration. Tap the area shown in the middle to open Region Overview.

content.cn:
武器会为干员提供<@gd.key>攻击力</>加成。
每件武器都拥有若干个<@gd.key>武器技能</>，分别提供了不同的属性加成与技能效果。
content.en: Weapons primarily give operators a <@gd.key>Base ATK</> bonus. Every weapon may come with one or more <@gd.key>weapon skills</> that give different attribute bonuses and skill effects.

content.cn:
可将<@gd.key>武器升级素材</>和<@gd.key>其他武器</>作为经验素材进行武器<@gd.key>升级</>。
当武器达到一定等级时，需要使用<@gd.key>武器突破素材</>来进行<@gd.key>突破</>，从而提升等级上限。
武器升级或突破后，性能会显著提升。
content.en: <@gd.key>Weapon EXP materials</> and/or <@gd.key>other weapons</> can be used to give a weapon EXP and <@gd.key>level it up</>. When a weapon reaches a level cap, <@gd.key>weapon tuning materials</> must be used to <@gd.key>tune</> it and raise its level cap. Leveling up and tuning weapons can significantly improve their performance.

content.cn: 使用<@gd.key>已升级过的武器</>作为<@gd.key>经验素材</>时，会返还该武器升级消耗的经验素材和折金票。
content.en: No weapon EXP will be lost when using <@gd.key>upgraded weapons</> to provide <@gd.key>EXP</> to another. Weapon EXP that exceeds the limit will be returned as EXP materials and T-Creds.

content.cn:
有时在战斗后，可以获取到活性化物质——<@gd.key>基质</>。
每个<@gd.key>基质</>都有若干种能够对应提升的<@gd.key>武器技能</>。
当武器注入符合的<@gd.key>基质</>后，便能够提升<@gd.key>武器技能等级</>。
content.en: Defeated enemies may drop reactive substances known as <@gd.key>essences</>. Every <@gd.key>essence</> has stats that might improve specific <@gd.key>weapon skills</>. Infusing a weapon with the right <@gd.key>essence</> will upgrade the <@gd.key>weapon skill level</>.

content.cn:
管理员，欢迎来到<@gd.key>终末地百科</>！
您目前所查看的<@gd.key>教学记录</>，会收纳探索途中经历的引导教程内容。
<@gd.key>终末地百科</>会在武器、装备、素材和设备获取后收录对应条目；大部分敌人则是在击败后便会收录。
可随时回到这里，查询各项信息与教学内容，为您的探索提供助力。
content.en: Welcome to the <@gd.key>Endfield Database</> (EFDB), Endministrator! The <@gd.key>Tutorials</> section you are now perusing will record various tutorials and guides as you explore the world of Talos-II. The <@gd.key>EFDB</> will generate new entries when you acquire weapons, gear, materials, and facilities. To generate entries on most enemies, you must defeat them first. You can always return here to view various data and guides to support your exploration efforts.

content.cn: 探索等级的提升会产生诸多影响，包括<@gd.key>干员等级上限提升</>、<@gd.key>稀有采集物</>和<@gd.key>稀有矿物</>的<@gd.key>存在数量上限</>和<@gd.key>每日刷新数量</>提升，以及<@gd.key>协议空间</>开放等级提升等。
content.en: Exploration Level affects: <@gd.key>operator level caps</>; <@gd.key>availability</> and <@gd.key>daily refreshes</> of <@gd.key>rare gatherables</> and <@gd.key>rare minerals</>; and available threat levels of <@gd.key>Protocol Spaces</>.

content.cn: 随着探索等级的提升，世界中敌人的等级也将一并提升。您将面临更多挑战。
content.en: Higher Exploration Level also raises the levels of enemies in the world and makes battles more challenging.

content.cn:
探索等级会随着<@gd.key>主线任务</>的进度而提升。
 探索等级达到3级之后，每次提升还需要完成<@gd.key>探索等级验证任务</>才能提升。
content.en: Exploration Level increases with <@gd.key>main mission</> progression. After reaching Exploration Level 3, special <@gd.key>Exploration Level trial missions</> must be completed first to raise it further.

content.cn: 可以在<@gd.key>协议同步器</>中进行探索等级的下调和还原，每次下调后将会有一定的冷却时间。
content.en: Use the <@gd.key>Protocol Synchronizer</> (Protosync menu) to lower or restore the Exploration Level. Lowering the Exploration Level starts a cooldown before it can be changed again.
